product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: BJ
review: The scent feels cologne-ish, it‚Äôs a bit strong but my husband is a huge fan. The candle seems to last a decent amount of time as well. It‚Äôs become a staple in our home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Mrs Ref
review: After months of receiving the Eucalyptus scent, I did not receive this scent on my last shipment! The candle was darker and didn‚Äôt smell at all like eucalyptus. Someone must be adding labels to the wrong candles. Not pleased!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Heather the Great
review: Smells like those guys from high school that used to bathe  with cologne! It just smells like men‚Äôs cologne! Even husband hates it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Mommomof5
review: I love Yankee Candles ,have purchased for years directly from them, but now only Amazon.  They are half the price of Yankee!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Michelle Chapin
review: Don‚Äôt buy.  Candle does not hold up. Melted weird. And was gone in a few hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Tami Gee
review: First, it still amazes me how fast Amazon can get an order to you!  This candle is one of my favorite top 5 scents.  The price was outstanding.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Gwendolyn E. Jenkins
review: One of their best scents.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Midsummer's Night,Black
author: Sky
review: Loved this buy! The price was wonderful, as I‚Äôve always loved yankee products but not usually the prices. Nice addition to my Halloween decor!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: mary e. hoffman
review: have bought yankee candles for years.  what a disappointment.  this is my last yankee candle purchase

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: mary e. hoffman
review: have bought yankee candles for years.  what a disappointment.  this is my last yankee candle purchase

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jeff H.
review: Once upon a time, Yankee Candles were premium scented candles. These days, not so much. I bought two candles, one Balsam & Cedar and the other Autumn Wreath.  You can barely smell the scents of either, even after burning for a substantial period of time. You can smell them if you hold your nose up to the candle, but the scent just doesn‚Äôt dissipate much once lit. I‚Äôm incredibly disappointed and most likely will be submitting a return on BOTH candles. And this is definitely not the first time this has happened. The quality of their candles has clearly went downhill in recent years. At any rate, it‚Äôs high time for me to find a new candle brand that actually delivers on their scents!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jeanne Smith
review: Below is my review. I read an article (Avery Hartmans/Business Insider) that stated the lack of smell with this candle is due to COVID. Mr. Hartmans generalization is unfounded. I have Village Candles that I can smell just fine and have no issues tasting or smelling what I eat or drink. When will we stop blaming everything on COVID?!? The candle has one wick and is very pretty. There is zero scent when burning the candle. I purchased one for us and another to give as a gift. The lack of scent when being burned, I will donate the second one. We have always purchased Village Candles and trying Yankee Candles was not a good choice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Sherry Wallen
review: I love the scent.. I‚Äôm watching Rachel Maddow‚Äôs story about folks not being able to smell scented candles, including Yankee. Statistics seem to show a correlation of Covid cases with folks not being able to ‚Äúsmell‚Äù the Candles. I just want you to know I can smell your candles and I Love Their Scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Pepper
review: No scent. Dissapointing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Virginia W.
review: So disappointing. You cannot even smell this candle. This scent used to be a favorite of mine, but now you cannot even tell it‚Äôs burning. Yankee Candle must have changed their formula. I won‚Äôt buy another Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Karen Gordon
review: Very mild scent unlit and no scent whatsoever when burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: GKR8
review: I bought several of these candles last fall in preparation for the holiday season. The intensity of the fragrance of those candles allowed the room to e filled substantially better than this one. All were Yankee candles, same size and same fragrance. The product is still good, just not as good. New Ownership?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Michael Vaughn
review: If you're one of the reviewers saying you can't smell this candle, you need to schedule a covid test. It's got a nice strong scent to it. My one complaint is the wick needs to be larger. Even letting it sit four hours for the first burn, I still got tunneling in this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Buckee
review: What a disappointment!  I was thinking this would be nice to burn in our living room where we set up our Christmas tree.  This is the first year that we‚Äôve had an artificial tree.  While I did not expect the candle to smell like a real tree, I was sad that it smelled nothing at all like a tree.  I detected a bit of a mint scent, but that‚Äôs about it.  I have an excellent sense of smell, as anyone in my family will tell you, so I know that it‚Äôs not that I‚Äôm missing something.  My spouse has a somewhat dulled sense of smell and he thinks the candle has a sort of sweet smell but not like a tree.  Did we get a ‚Äúbad‚Äù item?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: This candle EXPLODED after about 2 hours and ruined my China cabinet shelf and glassware.  No one was in the room at the time it exploded thankfully.  This could have been a very bad incident and people could get seriously injured!  These should be REMOVED from the market!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: So disappointed! I bought this exact candle scent last Christmas- balsam and cedar - and it was perfectly scented. Beautiful and filled the entire room. This year I bought this scent again only the 2 wick style‚Ä¶no scent!  So I decided to purchase another‚Ä¶  go back to what I had last year-this jar style -thinking perhaps that was the difference.  Nope! No scent. Yankee candles have been my go to for years. I am sorry but no more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Samantha
review: I buy yankee candles every year .  I bought 4 large jars and they have little no scent ! I bought a cheaper brand Village candle and that candle  gave off a stronger scent then thsn all 4 candles I had. Burning  at the same time !  I NOTICED THIS LAST YEAR TOO ! My sister in law stop buying them 2 years ago for same reason .  I thought it was my inauguration. I'm now buying Thyme candles much better . The smallest Thyme candle had my whole livingroom smelling than 4 yankee candles did burning at 1 time. STOP USING COVID AS AN EXCUSE FOR POOR PRODUCT !!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Andy
review: The smell flows well through the home, the scent is strong but not powerful so you catch a wiff of it no matter where you are. It's not a constant scent that you get used to. It returns like a fresh candle from the store. I had mine lit non-stop for an entire week. 24/7. Never blown out. It lasted and stayed smelling good all week long. Not a candle guy, but this brand has made me one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: D. Chamberlain
review: The price was good... about what I pay when they are on sale locally... but... when it arrived the wax was up high surrounding the wick and had a large empty space down the side. I had to spend time using a sharp knife to cut up the wax and push it down into the empty area and to expose the wick enough to light it. Thankfully I was able to get it lit but it looks pretty cruddy. I'm hoping after it burns a few hours the wax will melt down into a pool of wax which no longer looks like chunky green sand. I will not be buying another.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Just a guy
review: Normally pretty happy with Yankee Candles however this one melted/resolidified during storage before shipping. Item arrived with all the wax formed along 1 side of the jar with the wick settled on the bottom.  I attempted to slowly melt the wax by placing the jar in hot water in hopes of salvaging the candle.  While I was successful in getting the wick, straightening it, and placing it to be useable...  the wax and scented oil apparently separated during my melting attempt and the candle has a very chemical smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: How am I supposed to light it?! It‚Äôs not even useable!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Shantanu
review: Burns unevenly. Most of the wax just burns through the center leaving a tunnel of wax outside left unburned. The scent is mediocre at best. I would recommend Bath and bodyworks candles over these ones just for better wax quality.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Kindle Customer
review: This can‚Äôt be a real Yankee Candle.  It‚Äôs smells terrible, as the jar is different than other genuine candles I‚Äôve purchased.  If the price is too good to be true, trust me it‚Äôs fake P.U. !!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: maribeth
review: no scent whatsoever unless you face plant in to the glass vessel. burned it for 8 hours and, ta da, NO fragrance

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: WLPeck
review: A gentle scent which is not overpowering and burns slowly enough to last. Have been buying Yankee candles for years and always pleased. Once you‚Äôve tried Yankee brand, no others will be good enough. The value is in their longevity and true-to-life scents. Recommend for oneself or as gifts!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: J.K.
review: Every year for as long as I can remember, I splurge to get the Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar candle. The scents are always strong. Not this one. I couldn't believe it. The $3 supermarket pine candle I bought last week has way more scent than this. This is so unusual for yankee candle. I should have paid more attention to the other reviews. I could only faintly smell this candle when standing in front of it. I let it burn for an hour and there is very little scent. I'm going to buy from Yankee Candle directly and see if it's the same as this or the normal overpowering christmas tree scent it is supposed to be and that I love.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Valencia
review: This was an expensive candle and it has no aroma at all.  I burned it for more than 45 minutes.  Still can't smell it.  I won't be buying any more Yankee Candles.  Very disappointed.  Garbage.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jo
review: Yankee candles were always my favorite‚Ä¶but I burned this for a couple hours and No Scent.. Never again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Darlene Quinn
review: I bought 2 large jars of Balsam and Cedar scent by Yankee Candle and I love it.  If I had gone by the negative reviews, I would be missing out on a wonderful, Christmassy scent.  I have one in my living room and one in my dining room and when I walk out of my home office into my hallway I can smell the scent right away.  So don't pay any attention to the reviews that say it doesn't have a scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ericka DC
review: The media could not be loaded. It smells delicious, it only has one wick, not two, it is worth what it costs and the aroma is very well perceived.  I'll buy another in case they run out or not it's just as good

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: sandmaster
review: I used to love Yankee candles as they were well made.  The ones i recently ordered smell  great....but Yankee must've started using dollar store wicks, cause they just pour out black smoke.  At the beginning, in the middle  and I'm down to about two inches left in the jar, and still black smoke.  Wax melts clean from the jar, but good grief....these wicks are bad.  Yankee....what happened?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Rhoni
review: Who orders Balsam & Cedar for "light scent"? I usually get these from the Yankee store, but this year decided to order from Amazon. Seems like it was a big mistake. (Also I do not, nor have I had Covid) my kids tell me that I can smell crickets fart in Arizona & I live in Philly. This was such a disappointment. My house was ready for Christmas, but the entire affect was lost due to lack of what my house is supposed to smell like. I'll know better next time....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: beep h
review: Let me first say I DO NOT HAVE COVID and never have. This candle does not smell at all. I was soooo excited for the deal I was getting. 18 dollars for a large jar!! Unreal. And because I have had Yankee candles in the past and know how strong they usually are, I only bought one knowing it will smell up my entire house!! However, no smell. And I put my nose in the jar. NO SMELL!! Do not waste your money!!!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Mary
review: This has very little fragrance.  Im really very disappointed as I bought for the Christmas season. I have another yankee candid I bought from Amazon.  The fragrance smells like cookies are literally cooking throughout our home. I just wouldn‚Äôt recommend if your looking for a balsam fragrance.  Couldn‚Äôt even smell directly in the room after burning for many hours.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Debby A
review: I ordered this particular candle because in the past it was very strong smelling. However I am sitting 6 feet away from it and smell nothing. I have to be a few inches away to smell it at all.  What went wrong with Yankee Candles?

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: M. Cirka
review: You have to stand next to this candle while it‚Äôs lit in order to smell anything at all. I suspect that this could be a knock off with a Yankee Candle label stuck on it. If not then their quality seriously went down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Chris G
review: We've been buying Yankee Candle's Balsam Cedar candle every year at Christmas for decades.  It started when we got our first artificial tree and still wanted that amazing balsam scent in the house.  This candle delivers.  While we have noticed that the strength of the scent has weakened over the years (hence 4 stars instead of 5), it's still enough scent for the price.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Carmen Ellis
review: This is my favorite Yankee candle and I was so excited but after lighting it and burning it for a few hours there is no scent. Like nothing. This had to be old stock or something. Really disappointed..

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Carol T
review: I wasn't going to write a review of this candle until I read an article about the reason that "WE" couldn't smell our new candles. Apparently, COVID is the reason. We can't smell it because we have lost our sense of smell. That's right "All of us who write these reviews". FYI, I have never had COVID! How can you explain that I can smell the litter box but not the candle? These candles are just a big paperweight and a waste of money! Don't buy Yankee anymore folks, the product is not up to par anymore.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ruthluk
review: As one who does not connect to strong smells, I bought this candle and it is perfect !! The room is full of a delicate and good scent of calm, highly recommended

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ccgirl
review: My husband is not exactly the candle type (HA!), but I put this on the kitchen counter, and he has been the one to light it nearly every time. He'll stand over it and give it a sniff before lighting. Great, fresh, outdoorsy scent; he's already telling me to get another one. (Hoping it goes on sale again--I caught a great price.)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: katt7482
review: I love Yankee candles but this one just didn't have a strong scent. I have burned it and also put it on a warmer and neither time has the scent filled my living room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ew
review: The scent is lovely but doesn‚Äôt seem as strong as Other Yankee candle items I have purchased direct from Yankee candle in Maine.it would fill the house in minutes. It was unexpected ‚Ä¶..also has one wick which if Memory serves me ,was changed to 2 at one point. Other than that I‚Äôd still buy yankee Candle items!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: ess
review: I love this scent! It fills my bedroom and makes me feel like I'm in the woods. The scent lasts for a long time and is strong, but not overpowering. I will definitely buy this scent again for next winter. And if you follow the directions on burning the candle and trimming the wick then the candle wax won't tunnel.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Brooke Barton
review: Closet live tree scent I have ever tried without the tree mess! Smell lasts through every burn and doesn‚Äôt fade. Can‚Äôt beat the price. I was told by Yankee employees to burn for at least 1.5 hours to allow wax to burn out to glass edge to avoid ‚Äúwax pooling‚Äù creating a hole down the middle of your candle. Good advice for expensive candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: A. Mitchell
review: This candle reminds me of Christmas the moment I open it. If you're like me and have an artificial tree but long for that pine scent, you're going to love this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: A B
review: As others have said, this candle really lacks any scent when burned. You have to literally be on top of it to get anything. I have been VERY disappointed in Yankee Candles lately and will not be purchasing them any longer. The two fall ones I bought directly from their store had the same issue. Too expensive for this nonsense. Over it!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jackie
review: Finally a Yankee candle with that new fresh scent....it's been yrs since I have had a Yankee candle that actually smelled as strong as this one. Don't know why, for some reason they slowly got less and less fragrant. BUT, this one is FANTASTIC!! I will be buying more from this seller for sure!! Thank you!!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: suzz
review: Ordered 2 of the exact same thing at the exact same time. One candle had a great scent that lasted most of the way thru the candle as it burned. The second one had very little scent. Not sure why.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Tarachase
review: I bought this candle as a gift for a friend, and she loved it. The scent is very Christmas-y, which is what I was hoping for. I definitely recommend it. Also, got it at a great price on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jacqueline Wehmeyer
review: This was my 4th Balsam & Cedar candle in just over a year. The three I bought in 2020 had a great scent as always. I finished the 3rd one & lite this one I received last month immediately. It has no scent. I have been burning it now for 3 weeks and the only time I can smell it is when I take the lid off. I am very disappointed I cannot smell this. And I do not have COVID as some news reports out their state that people have lost their smell due to COVID.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Emily Dickenson
review: Wondering if this is a real Yankee candle.  I recall their scent being stronger than what I got.  Will be purchasing other brands in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: David Beblo
review: I bought the Balsam & Cedar for the Christmas Season. It does smell nice when I walk past it but otherwise you'd never know that there was a lit candle in the room. My whole house is only 1084 square feet. I used to be able to smell a REAL Yankee Candle throughout the house. Not Anymore! Ever since Yankee Candle was sold their candles are no better than Dollar Tree candles. It's a shame.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: PD
review: Wanted  to light the  candle, not one used on a candle warmer

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Myra Luan Bergstrom
review: Regret purchase . Very very weak scent. Not like the power of scent like my other yankee candles I have purchased elsewhere

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: nwf
review: When burning there is barely any scent of balsam and cedar, even when I stand right next to the burning candle.  Very disappointed.  I had expected a scent to throw through at least 3 rooms that are open to one another.  Burns nicely, but that's all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: hollybird4
review: While (when you can smell it) it smells just like a Christmas tree, it is not a strong candle. It does not fill a room, and it's hard to detect a scent from it even while standing a couple of feet away. I will say though that for a one wick, it burns really evenly. Not horrible for the price, but not what I was expecting from a Yankee Candle brand item.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Diane Dreger
review: Most Yankee candles have lost the scents the last several years. Was scared to try again. Use to only buy Yankee for 25 years, have stopped until I tried 2 candles, this one and will see how that one smells, also Yankee gives off black soot that accumulates on your walls.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Purchaser
review: Easily my favorite candle that exists. The scent is a perfect holiday tree scent. With hints of pine and wood burning in the fireplace. I've had many similar scented candles, but Yankee has the best burn time and the most even scent without overpowering you.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Lisa
review: This candle smells great and the fragrance is strong.  I stopped buying Yankee candles years ago and switched to a different brand after being repeatedly disappointed by very weak scents, but this one did not disappoint.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Milly
review: The candles came melted in the jar such that the wicks are covered up and are completely unusable. I was planning on gifting these, but I can't even just keep them and use them now. What a waste.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: It just smacks you of pine scent like a disinfectant. Not very good at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: darrin
review: Especially when you buy on Amazon.  Everything u buy from Amazon is a little off. If it's food the flavor is just not right. This candle the smell just isn't there.  Seems like no one is watching or regulating Amazon so you get what you pay for.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: Yankee  candle without a scent. Look forward to this Christmas candle all year. Terrible candle does not have a smell...Useless !! Yankee candles are best candles by far do not buy off Amazon or waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: papergirl
review: This candle is very fragrant. It seems very long lasting though the flame is surprisingly quite substantial, probably an inch and a half when you light it. It's packaged very well. I'd purchase again for myself as well as for a gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Angel
review: Yankee candles are well worth the money you pay for it. It really smells like a Christmas tree... we have always had a fake Christmas tree & by having this candle, it smells like a fresh cut pine tree... You cannot go wrong with any of the Yankee Candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Nunya Biznezz
review: I‚Äôve bought this candle before, and the fragrance would fill the room.  This one barely has a scent.  Boo.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Beagle Lady
review: This candle is so fragrant and long lasting! It brings back memories of Christmas and winter coziness. So pleased with this purchase!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: We always buy this candle for the holidays, this one is the best! Except the batch from this year‚Ä¶barely noticeable! The glade version in target was better than this at a fraction of the cost! Very disappointed this year.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jim Lombardo
review: Truly reminiscent of an Adirondack Pine forest, reminded me of camping there as a youth, you'll want to burn it constantly, but if you do, it won't last.....like virtually all other candles :( Lol!, But it does last many, many hours making the area it's in smell awesome for days. HIGHLY recommended!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Janet L. McGriff
review: Great price at the time I purchased it. Rich scent of pine. Perfect for this holiday season! You can smell it through out a large area on my first floor. The scent and candle are long lasting! Will buy again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Marel Mayfield
review: Yankee candles are the Best. Amazon offered this one before Christmas at a very reasonable price. I bought it and I'm sure for Christmas it will be perfect. I've bought the same Yankee candle before and it never disappoints.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Walter McMillan
review: This candle had no scent when lit, I was highly disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Lynn H.
review: What has happened to ‚ÄúYankee Candle‚Äù company?  Got the large Balsam and Fir for Christmastime.  Nobody could even smell it burning.  The press is now saying that the bad reviews for Yankee Candles could be due to loss of smell from Covid.  Definitely not the reason for us, thankfully.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: I am so disappointed with Yankee Candle. No scent and a flame that is really out f the jar.No wonder they were on sale!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Claire David
review: I love this scent so much. It smells like the holidays! It burns forever and the wick never clumps up. Easily restarts to burn- evenly. Our absolute favorite during the holiday season.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Tha Chudster
review: This scent is what I was looking for to get me in the mood for winter time.  It's not too overpowering which is nice.  Definitely recommend for those wishing to get in the holiday spirit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Eileen G.
review: I expected this candle to be nicely scented considering it is a Yankee candle. Sadly, I burned it for 3 hours and there was absolutely no scent. I don‚Äôt know if it was a defect or what? I purchased another candle (Not a Yankee) same scent at a store for $4.99 and within 10 min. of lighting it the scent filled the entire room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Heather Renee
review: God I love scent. It makes my house smell like a cedar forest, how very lovely it is!! Nice and strong! Quickly covers the funky smells that emanate in the room. Aka the dog And this sucker burns, it has outlived all my other off brand candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Cynthia A. Wall
review: Loved the fresh balsam scent for Christmas! Yankee candles have been my favorite over 25 yrs. Always smell great, burn well down to near end of wax while still smelling great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: LiveLoveLift
review: The jar broke as soon as we opened it before our Christmas eve dinner. Such a disappointment as the smell was fantastic but I would not risk it with the poor glass wualt

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: mdlubsu
review: I purchase this candle yearly to celebrate the Christmas season. This candle has very, very little scent and virtually no throw. Disappointing. I would not waste money on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: dianne
review: Yankee Candles are great, but this one smelled more like Cedar than Balsam. Too bad. If you like Cedar, you will probably like this. It's quite nice for the winter holidays.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Donna B.
review: They say we can‚Äôt smell them because of COVID, wonder why my other candles smell. Think they forgot to scent some batches & that‚Äôs why some give 5 stars BTW, we haven‚Äôt had COVID.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Janice Bateson
review: It's a Yankee candle! That's all that needs to be said. In 40 years I've never had a bad Yankee candle. You can count on them for quality. And there fall and Christmas scents are unmatchable. And delivery time was excellent .

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: CoolRunninJA
review: Had visitors for the holidays and lit this candle everyday. Left a great smell throughout the house and got complimented on it. Highly recommend!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: SuperStar
review: I got the balsam scent for winter.  It smells great. Not over powering at all. Just a nice woodsy scent. The candle color is good too. A pretty dark green.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: MargaritaLover78
review: Another great Christmas season candle scent. We love this candle scent and I can never have enough of these. I am so happy with the scent and I love the product

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Paul

I was very pleased with Amazon's customer service. My first Candle sent out was damaged and Amazon replaced it immediately without any problems. THANK YOU!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ajb
review: I have bought Yankee candles for years but this one had no smell. No I do not have covid as other candles in my home fill the room with an amazing scent that is smelled by all. I can only smell wax and am very disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ashley
review: The scent is PERFECT, but sadly it appears that maybe some of the top wax melted and smeared over the lid and then my hand when opening it. Not a huge deal since the candle smells great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Gina
review: I absolutely love the pine scents from Yankee candle, they smell like Christmas! They last super long and just one candle gives my whole downstairs a strong amazing scent!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Dianne Lyles
review: I love Balsam the scent makes you feel that a Christmas tree has just been cut.  This is what I use the entire Holiday Season.  Absolutely recommend Yankee Candle and especially Balsam.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: john aven

Unhappy that after a half hour really no smell from the candle burning in the middle of a fairly small room. Got more smell from a couple of car fresheners. ] Sorry Yankee candle if that what it truly was. Missed the boat on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: RM
review: It lit only once. It will not relight. Why am I forced to remove wax after spending this much money on a candle? Find another NON - MASS PRODUCED CANDLE

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Donna M.
review: Disappointed!. All Yankee Candle products I have bought in the past have been fantastic, however, these particular candles gave off relatively no scent. I love yankee candles but not this one. Maybe it‚Äôs old and that‚Äôs why on sale

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Stephan M. Twiss
review: I get this candle with this fragrance every year around Christmas and let it burn all day every day. It never loses its scent. Smells just like a Christmas tree.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: All My Shoes
review: This is such a lovely fresh clean smell. I don‚Äôt burn candles I just scoop out maybe a teaspoon full and put it in my wax melt warmer!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Hockeymom
review: Love it. Didn‚Äôt have a real tree this year and missed the smell of the greenery but this was a decent substitute. Very relaxing

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: D. DUROSE
review: Smells great and is perfect for the holiday season. Excellent quality compared to other candles I‚Äôve tried. Yankee candles are the best

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: raudel martinez
review: La vela  buen aroma pero el olor es suave....apenas se siente ,pense q oleria mas....me quedo con las de bath and body work ....

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Jan
review: This smells really bad.  Really really bad !!!  Total waste of money & of course it can‚Äôt be returned because I lit the stinky thing üòµ‚Äçüí´

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Cortney M.
review: I‚Äôve heard wonderful things about yankee candles so I thought I would spend the extra money to get a great Christmas smell. I burned this candle all day and there was no smell. We definitely don‚Äôt have Covid either . Super bummed out !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: E. Stevens
review: Unlike other candles that melt away in a couple of days, this candle lasts forever. It has a great scent and is slow burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Amazon Customer
review: They must have changed the formula as the scent is not as strong.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Lindsay King
review: This candle lives up to the Yankee Candle name. The aroma is heady and carries through my large office. It smells exactly as expected, like winter. Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Bette Vidrine
review: This candle had obviously been in very high heat.  The wax was melted and is misshapen and the wick is nowhere to be seen.  I can still use it for scent, but no candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: gen
review: The media could not be loaded. Hi it has  too much wax! Needed to trim cant find a wick

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: kimkaroo
review: Scent is minimal and they burn twice as fast as  Village candles .... and a waste of money to boot,even at $14 each.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: LAP99
review: Still better than scented candles from other big box stores.  At sale prices, Yankee candles beat big box stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Nelson V.
review: I read the reviews where some claimed the candles were counterfeit reproductions but the one I received is definitely authentic. Burns well, smells great and glass/lid as well as packaging was legit Yankee Candle. Price was good‚Ä¶.Very happy with my purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: mary dalton
review: Amazing cedar pine scent for the home or office, nice gift for anytime, great product value, packaged very well

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Rigger babe
review: Great scent but the top cracked first time I put the lid back on after using it.  Very thin glass.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Linda S. Tritt
review: Very disappointed with Yankee candles. They used to have a very strong fragrance but these you can barely smell. Will not be gifting these.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Duck Ford
review: We have a fake Christmas Tree‚Ä¶ but it‚Äôs great to surround ourselves with the aroma of a real tree whenever we want!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Florida
review: Yankee candles have always been the best and this is no exception. I love the aromas of Christmas! Good gift idea

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Chris S.
review: I love Yankee Candle and Village Candle n they make such amazingly scented candles. I just wish the price was a little lower.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Teresa C.
review: This candle has no scent of a pine or cedar tree, whatsoever. Should have just bought the same candle from Walmart for $7.00

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Balsam & Cedar
author: Ruth
review: I was afraid to order because of breakability but well packaged & love smell of any of their candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: LS
review: Really disappointed with us Mel. I am a lemon free, I like the freshness and zest of lemon. I tried it for after the New Year to get rid of all the Christmas smells, and I actually had the blow it out. I am not one of those fuzzy people who complains, I love candles oh, but this one was actually sickening. I kept trying to decide what it smelled like, and it smell like a gas station bathroom with one of those air fresheners. No I didn't return it, I don't believe in just returning things because you're unhappy with a smell, but I am disappointed with Yankee Candle for that. I wish descriptions were more realistic and believable. You can't know a smell until you buy the stupid thing, and that's twenty bucks down the drain

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Sunny417
review: This was a blind purchase and I'm glad I took the chance. I was worried it was going to smell like furniture polish, but it is a lovely fruity lemon scent almost like kids cereal. Very pleased!

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: CheeryToes
review: I was really expecting this candle to have more of a cilantro scent, the idea of the candle is great, the reality is a heavily pineapple scented candle that makes me rather nauseous. I waited a year or two for the price to drop on this when it did I snapped it up - what a disappointment - I cannot recommend this scent. blech

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Ranger
review: Have enjoyed these candles for many years. It was a nice surprise to see some of the scents here on Amazon for far less than retail at their stores. Of course, not all inventory was available but I found three that I like. Highly recommend purchasing these Yankee Candles on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: paulinespens
review: This smell of this candle is horrific. It isn't no where near a fruity, Happy smell. I lit the candle soon as I got it. I was so excited. Lemon is one of my favorite smells. It burned for a few hours as I did my own thing around the house. I realized I hasn't smelled lemon yet so I went to check the candle. Whatever you used for this candle please never use it again. The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: K. M. Benjamin
review: I can smell this wonderful apple scent ! Which I believe means I don‚Äôt have COVID . Who knew that candles could be so important in the fight against it. Of course the shipping was super fast and the product was careful bundled to make it to me !

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: A. Hassan
review: I am very sensitive to air fresheners and scented things, in general-- including most YC scents. This one smells clean and light and does not make me wheeze. The lid fits tightly enough to keep in all the "post candle extinguishing smoke of death".

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: ernest g ruiz
review: I bought this candle a while back ( not from amazon ) , beautiful aroma.I ordered the same candle form Amazon, and as you can see in photos it's damaged.The Amazon customer service is excellent and they are sending me a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Christine
review: I normally buy this candle directly from Yankee candle but I wanted it sooner so I ordered it on Amazon because of the price I was totally disappointed that this candle did not even fill my living room with the scent would definitely  not by again

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Michael Kopecky
review: This product comes badly packaged off Amazon shipping and will easily break like mine did the second you open it.  It also smells absolutely disgusting, worse than any artificial lemon scent I‚Äôve ever smelled!  What a waste of my money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Erin
review: I love this sweet citrusy smell. I know it's meant for summer, but I like to burn it with the windows open on a cool day. It's a nice scent to air out the room, especially on cleaning days, when it covers cleaning sprays' scents subtly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: mady b.
review: I ran out of a candle with this particular scent and was glad to find it on amazon for such a great deal. I‚Äôve already been burning it for hours and it still smells as amazing as it did at first and barely any wax has melted so I know this will last a long amount of time

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: LilMar
review: I've been buying McIntosh for many years. Great throw, and it smells like fresh, crunchy apples..... Just apples. Perfect scent in September when the orchards are harvesting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Nicholette Corn
review: When you smell the candle up close it smells great. However there is no throw of the scent. You can‚Äôt even tell it is burning when you walk by. I would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Steven Doyle
review: Disappointed had high stars and reviews but I have a snall apartment left candle on came home 4 hours later and when I walked in there wasn't even a scent....garbage

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Abhija
review: Please do urself a Favor and skip this buy. Its just waste of money there is ZERO throw on burn not even know what the‚Ä¶ is this it literally smells nothing normally there is good ..ok..bad smell .. but this is like there is nothing even after a good 2hr burnüôÑ

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Jacqueline D.
review: I love Yankee candles, the Macintosh Apple scent smells fresh like real apples. I just wish they'd burn longer. I get the large jar and burn it continuously so they don't last very long in my home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Tiffany
review: Definitely melted at one point of its transit life. You can see that the wax even partially melted in to the lid. The wick is barely there. Smells great though

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Gallant
review: I ordered this candle and it came broken. Amazon replaced it (thank you). My replacement smells great. I like this fragrance over the holidays. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Pamela H.
review: This is a memory from way back. This Blueberry Yankee Candle means so much to me. I had some about 30 years ago and bought one for a Christmas gift for my wonderful brother.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: BAK
review: I have used many scents of Yankee candles.  I am using an evergreen scent just now.  I got this one for a friend who loves fruit scents.  It is a great gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought these on a sale for $10.  They came individually boxed and perfect for gift giving. Love the lemon scent.  Burn great.  A+

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: kayrn brumley
review: Smells wonderful...just like every Yankee I've bought before. I will add that I've never had covid, so my sense of smell is still 100%. Love your products!

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Minidonut
review: Pictures shown what I received. The wax spilled off one side and it covered the candle wick. I had to melt the wax around the wick for a while in order for it to light. It can not be gifted anymore, but I do like the scent. It's smell of citrus scent and last long in my kitchen. I love all the Yankee candles; especially this scent in my kitchen. It keeps my kitchen smell fresh and odor-free

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: jason ryan
review: I like the smell, I had this candle before and had to get another one. It was more than I wanted to pay for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: SMB
review: This is one of my favorite scents from Yankee Candle.  Makes you think that you're apple picking on a sunny fall day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Michelangelo
review: wish I didn't have to blast it with a torch lighter to get the sides to melt evenly, not a big deal, it's kind of fun, but probably not the best trait for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Riq
review: This candle will literally last you months if you don‚Äôt constantly burn it. Even if you do it will still last long and the smell is amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Tmat360
review: The candle smelled great in the paper bag package, but it wasn't wrapped in bubble wrap or in a cardboard candle holder so the glass tumbler that held the candle was broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smelled great when I got it out of the box. I lit the candle and it smells like old laundry detergent . The lemon scent completely disappeared . This was for the Sicilian lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Daniel koski
review: We ordered the Macintosh candle. When we got it, the initial smell was amazing. Exactly what we wanted. But by the 2nd or 3rd day the smell wasn‚Äôt there anymore? It was more faint than strong. I saw in the reviews that others were having that issue with the smell as well but I figured we‚Äôd give it a chance. Kinda disappointed in it. Gonna be trying it out in a smaller space such as a bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Retail Therapist
review: Bit less throw than usual but worth the price. Arrived well packed and intact. Good gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: The Wolf
review: The wick is too low, the candle goes out. It is nearly full and I can't use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Pineapple Cilantro Jar Candle, Large Jar
author: Jeana Lee Paccasassi
review: No scent! What a waste of $30 bucks! I‚Äôm sending back or asking for a credit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Deborah
review: I love my yankee candle. I have sinus problems so finding a candle I can smell is difficult. I lift the lids in the stores & if I can‚Äôt smell it I won‚Äôt buy it. Yankee candles have always had a great scent. I had a woman come over once when I had the lid off the jar as she came up my stairs she said ‚ÄúThank Heaven , Scented candles‚Äù The previous place she went smelled like cats and dogs. I knew that person and she always has a very clean house. I had a cat myself but she couldn‚Äôt smell any cat smells. I keep a clean litter box because I cannot live with the smell. It gets cleaned after every use and taken outside to the trash . The other lady taught me that so I know her litter was clean. The candles make a huge difference.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Bargnhtress
review: Horrible!!!  I have been buying a lot of Yankee Candles from Amazon lately because of the deals they have been having.  I bought over a dozen in the last month here but have been buying them for over 30 years.  This one just about made me gag!  It smells like rotten burnt coconut shells!  Gross!!!  I gave it a good try but will be returning it.  I love most of the others but this one is like burning rotten garbage in the back of a smoothie shop!  It smells like they let tropical fruit rot and then juiced them and added it to the wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: JPB
review: I have this candle on scheduled regular delivery.  The last batch had very minimal fragrance.  No, it has nothing to do with sense of smell being affected by covid.  I bought a different brand scented candle from the store in place of this purchase. It's scented and the aroma was just perfect.  I can smell it and it emitted a wonderful scent. I had several people try smelling the Yankee candle.  Each and everyone said there was hardly any aroma.  Please stop making excuses.  Someone.dropped the ball and covid was just an easy excuse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Serpico16
review: As stated, the wife got me hooked on fragrant candles.  Lived half of my life without an opinion either way, don't know how I ever managed. Must admit, this Lilac Blossom scent is simply excellent.  A definite favorite of ours. Yankee Candle (JAR TYPE) are a favorite of ours.  Price is right too. We like aromatic candles that last.  Some are very expensive and yet, I have to put my beak practically into the flame in order to recognize a hint of an aroma.  Big League Taboo for this 52 yr old kids beak, as I blister easily not to mention the discolored tip which is generally black or in a shade thereof. Not to mention it simply does nothing for my looks. But not with these Large Jar Yankee Candles with so much aroma. My beak is safe at last. Thank you Yankee Candle.  My beak thanks you too.  ;)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: M
review: I purchased this candle days ago and it has no scent at all!!! I just contacted customer service to get a refund and return the item but the associates didn't help. They will "contact" me in 24hrs by email regarding this issue. No questions about the item and truly no assistance at all. Yankee candles have a strong scent and this thing has none. Only the bottle with the name stating is a real Yankee candle which is definitely not!!!!! Scammer whoever sells this crap!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Kimberly S.
review: I love Yankee candle‚Äôs. This one has a very nice lite sent. It will not overwhelm you or overtake your home. I really like having this one in the bathroom when I take my bubble baths. Such a relaxing addition. The first candle I purchased the glass was cracked. I informed customer service and a second candle was at my back door the next day. You really can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee candle‚Äôs. Such good quality and such amazing customer service. I highly recommend them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Michele F
review: I grew up with fresh lilac bushes and have always enjoyed Yankee Candles (my favorites are Macintosh apple and Vanilla cupcake). I bought this expecting the same level of fragrance. While it does have a strong scent (which is why I buy the two wick candles), it doesn't smell anything like fresh lilac, rather it smells like an old lady's bathroom soap. Won't be purchasing this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: PepPep2
review: I'm relatively picky about rose-scented goods and usually want something that is as "natural-scented" as possible. This candle exceeds my expectation and really does smell like fresh cut roses. It's not overpowering and smells clean and easy. The size is also pretty big so this candle should last a very long time as well. The seller also delivered the item with a lot of care and arrived the next day after ordering via Prime. Awesome!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Lori
review: This candle does not look like the photo‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a very dark purple. Also the smell is off, not that lovely lavender/vanilla scent. I can‚Äôt even describe the smell. I would not recommend this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: T Rav
review: Looks crusty on top and color is not consistent. Bought for a gift but I would be embarrassed to give it looking like this. When I order from Amazon I don‚Äôt expect to receive seconds but it seems to be a thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: WarriorMom22
review: My daughter absolutely loves the smell of Yankee Candle Pink Sands! It has a strong throw that I find a little overwhelming in an area like a small bathroom, but it doesn't bother my daughter one bit. The scent incorporates citrus, fruity, floral, woodsy, and musk all in one. My daughter has loved this scent for over 2 years, and still isn't tired of it. I got her another one for Christmas. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Amazon Customer
review: a lot of the reviews are saying it's not good/fake/came broken but I ordered two large jar lilac candles and they were wrapped HELLA safely and smell amazingggg if u want to get it, get it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: T. Stacy
review: This candle is outstanding and will make the perfect gift for anyone who loves candles. The sent is strong and last long after its put out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Hummingbird Fan
review: This is one of my FAVORITE scents that Yankee Candle has during Fall/Halloween time. This year I had to buy it from Amazon, because Yankee didn‚Äôt release it for Halloween. I was told they just weren‚Äôt going to this year. Well they must have gotten the hint that people weren‚Äôt happy, cause they did a month later and on sale. But I had gotten mine from here so‚Ä¶but I‚Äôm still very happy I get them!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: J. W.
review: Beach walk is my favorite scent in the Yankee Candle lineup. It has a bright scent profile with floral undertones that you can‚Äôt quite put your finger on. It is aptly named, too - the scent makes me think of a cozy beachfront house with the windows open on a cool day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Justin
review: All these people writing false reviews about yankee candles not smelling should be banned from reviewing. I have always and always will love these candles. Yes there are a few scents that are a bit to feminine for my taste but even they smell delectable. Yankee candle you get a 110% from me. I just wish I could afford them more often than I can.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: GLaSalla
review: As soon as you open the top of the jar it smells like I just got a dozen roses it is amazing seriously it came quickly I was perfectly boxed and I am enjoying every minute of it I highly recommend it I will definitely re-order this again for the fifth time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Discerning Customer
review: This glass jar candle smells great! Unfortunately the glass jar arrived broken making it unusable. It is shipped to you at your risk. So good luck! It will be a great smelling and pleasant candle if it arrives in good condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: C. L. Cunningham
review: I like this candle for its pretty color reminiscent of the inside of a seashell and for its scent which is balanced and not overpowering (not too floral, not too citrus, not too spicy, not too musky). I find it pleasant and relaxing. This is a repeat purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Jenny
review: Where's the scent?  We ordered the Gardenia but you can't smell it. Yankee candles use to be premium candles, but no more. Proof positive that price isn't always an indicator of good quality.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Evefalling
review: Love the scent, it doesn't fade as candle burns.  Nice light slightly floral scent, . Burned down nicely, with scent strong the entire time. It does have a bit of zest to the smell that is invigorating,  yet calming also.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Lydia R Rogers
review: I love the scent of Pink Sands, it is the best! Hope they never discontinue this scent. It last a long time,  you don‚Äôt have to burn the candle a long time. Just let it pool after lighting then blow candle out. The scent last a long time‚Ä¶

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: April
review: 100% real Yankee candle! These candles are the absolute best. None came broken and the smell is exactly as if I‚Äôd bought it from a Yankee candle dealer. I will continue to buy more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: Jeanette Emmert
review: The smell of the roses in this candle are absolutely amazing. We gave this as a gift, and the recipient was so excited to get it because it is her favorite scent. Lovely

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: nallely arias
review: I love this scent I hVe 3 dogs in the house and they make stuff stink sometimes this candel drowns out the smell of my 3 dogs its good and not too strong lasted 2 weeks had it burning a long time every day though it smells like a garden of flowers love love love deff recommend for a gift ‚ù§

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Sun-Drenched Apricot Rose
author: MAWUTZ
review: Great smell

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: J C.
review: I ordered one to try to see how strong the aroma was. I placed it in a central location on the first floor and let it burn for a few hours. Couldn't smell a thing. So disappointed. I had to get right near the burning flame to be able to smell anything, and got burnt nose hairs instead.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Jade
review: This candle is super scented and the fragrance moves throughout the home, maintaining even after the candle is blown out.  Burns clean, lasts long, and is packaged beautifully if you wish to give as a gift.  Would highly recommend this seller and this product.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Colby
review: I bought 2 of these candles the Gingerbread and the Blueberry. They smell so good. Everytime one is burning when my husband walks into the house he askes me what I'm cooking. Just received them so I'm not sure how long they will last.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: NMarieNealkindle Customer
review: This Grandma's Kitchen Scent candle has such a warm and cosy scent.  The smell lingers even when the candle isn't burning. I love it!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Amazon Customer
review: Got the cinnamon roll one. Unfortunately it smells nothing like cinnamon rolls. I even had a relative of mine comment that it smelt bad. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Gina Little
review: It lasts awhile but the scent is quite weak. I won't get this candle again.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: nancy steurer
review: The description says non-toxic. It may be. It definitely produces a lot of black smoke. I am very disappointed in that. Also, the scent isn‚Äôt there enough for me.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Joyce L.
review: Great Candle! Nice Smell, not sure how long it will last cos I just got it but so far it is GREAT!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Anonymous Certified buyer
review: Lit it up, let ut burn for a couple hours, never let out a smell, total ripoff

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Freesia
review: As promised. Package well. Very nice.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

review: The little candle packed a beautiful smell and is a great holiday gift idea.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Zibbia
review: It‚Äôs a nice smell I love it manü•∞

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Alexis Roosa
review: I wanted to shop a small business for Christmas and my boyfriend loves candles. I wanted to get the blueberry pie but he likes apple pie so I got that. I haven‚Äôt used it yet but the initial smell is just a cinnamon candle. Im not a fan of it. I was looking forward to a sweeter scent.

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

review: I bought another candle much higher priced. It didn‚Äôt smell nearly as good as this one!!! I will buy again!!!

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: David Leffert
review: Smells great

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Amazon Customer
review: Little to no scent at all. Would not purchase again

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Tara
review: It melted well and smelled decent. My only complaint is that it had, just very slightly, an off scent. Kind of like a weird aftertaste to something like laffy taffy

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
