review: The sun wasn't there. I didn't really care for it too much sorry

product_title: Cinnamon Roll Scented Candles for Home | Non Toxic Long Lasting Soy Candles | Delicious Scent | Large 16 oz Mason Jar | Hand Made in The USA
author: Desiree B
review: Cute packaging, long burn time but weak throw‚Ä¶ I couldn‚Äôt smell it at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smells nice but is no where near as nice as a real Yankee candle.  I think these are counterfeit - someone kept the jar and refilled it with a candle but it just is not as strong nor pleasant as a real Yankee candle.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Todd
review: I'm a fan of Yankee Candle and have even visited their facility/headquarters. I've never purchased a candle from them and been disappointed . . . until this candle.  I ordered this and also a Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup, for the Fall season.  We can barely smell anything from the Yankee Spiced Pumpkin.  For a similar seasonal scent, I'd recommend the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup. Great scent. Yankee needs to go back to the drawing board on the Spiced Pumpkin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mimi
review: I am very disappointed in this Yankee candle. I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for more than 20 years. This my first Yankee Candle purchase on Amazon. In the past, I have always purchased from Hallmark Stores or Bed, Bath & Beyond, and never suffered a low quality Yankee Candle. This candle from Amazon vendor has a very weak scent. Past purchases had scents so strong the fragrance required burning a short 10 minutes only.  I have burned this fake candle almost 2 hours to only get a faint Autumn Harvest scent by sniffing near the jar. Having bought a same scent Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer, I am astounded at the difference being night & day. This is a knock-off Yankee Candle and my last purchase of such on Amazon. I would not recommend any fragrance offered of this cheaper version. You get what you pay for‚Ä¶buyer beware! Burned but not by the candle wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: 1956netta
review: I purchased this Candle in November, & saved this particular candle to light closer to the week of Christmas. The scent whatever it is did not work for me. There is hardly a scent, & smells nothing like Apple Cinnamon. The way it burns, & aside of the wax looking really weird, I‚Äôm inclined to believe this is not an Authentic ‚ÄúYankee Candle!‚Äù Will be returning!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Joe Morrow
review: Love the scent of this particular candle. Seasonal and warm. My kids love it, too. These candles last forever - dozens of hours of burn time. Do need to use a wick cutter, but that's basic candle care. When these go on sale, I love to give them away as holiday gifts because there is such a variety that they are customizable in terms of who I give them to.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nora M .
review: This is the first Yankee Candle that I didn't care for . The scent was not as I expected at all. The scent was more like a rancid and old smell . Was not giftable at all , the top of the wax was bubbly and discolored.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Dennis Husejnovic
review: I don't know if what I got was fake but I was never this disappointed by a Yankee candle. The pumpkin spice candle smelled like burning wax, no scent at all. I wonder if I was sent a fake... Never spending the money on them again, now they are expensive for no reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ben
review: The media could not be loaded. I bought this candle for about $20. It was bought using a gift card & I had no idea if it was worth it, but I wanted a candle & this scent caught my attention, and I am not dissapointed. I've had the candle lit for 12+ hours and it hardly made a dent in the wax. I've used it everyday since I recieved it 3 days ago. The scent takes just a little while to set in, but it will fill a room unlike some soy blends. I am almost certain that this candle will last me until March/April. And when that time comes, I WILL buy another. I recorded a video to show the small dent it has made. (Ignore the WAP in the back)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Brooke1982
review: I worry about buying candles online because sometimes they come melted, cracked, or older with no scent. This candle smells like it should and is in gift giving condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lisa D. Sample-Page
review: I‚Äôve always loved Yankee Candles,  I especially love the ‚Äúautumn‚Äù aromas.  This candle definitely delivered, great aroma, last forever, would make a great gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: kathy b.
review: I always buy yankee candles but I think this is the last time I have bought 3 in the last 2 or 3 months and I do not get that high smell like I got in the past years.  I don't know what you have done but the candels are not the same the smells are VERY VERY FAINT  I AM UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER AS OF NOW

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mike Graff
review: Smell is good, but it is the name you're paying for. Plenty of less expensive candles that last as long and smell as strong and good for about half the price. Burnt the candle about 1/3 of the way and the way it was made,, the wick was too close to the glass and it cracked from the heat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jaclyn Hensley
review: It was major savings and a risk (scent). Hope it smells better while burning. Apple is great, but the pumpkin or combining it has that indescribable unnatural tinge I dont like.  Packaged was impressive! Always worry about glass! Egg carton around the candle and fit snuggled in Yankee candle box, shipped in another box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Marta
review: Read all the raving reviews and had to get it now for the holidays. My family walked in Thanksgiving and immediately mentioned how wonderful my home smelled and they weren't talking about the turkey. Fills your home with this cozy, warm smell. I'm glad I got 2 of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: CarrieJo-83
review: While I will admit the scent of the candle is WONDERFUL! The whole candle is garbage. I ordered this on 12/27. This is how it arrived. Melted and not usable. I contacted Amazon.com who said I had to contact Yankee Candle and I did. No response. No refund. No replacement. So this $20 candle is garbage. Pretty disappointed. Especially in the Yankee Candle brand who claims they pride themselves on customer satisfaction. Buyer beware! If it arrives damaged, you‚Äôre stuck with it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Ann Marie Thompson
review: I have been looking for a nice fall scent and this was perfect. I burn a lot of candles. I am very pleased with yankee candles. They have gone up in price that was a bit of a surprise. But I guess like everything else. You can‚Äôt go wrong with this brand of candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: A. Mitchell
review: This was my first time getting this scent. Instead of 'sight unseen' this was a case of 'scent un-smelled'. I relied solely on reviews and I'm glad I did - this smelled great! This scent created the ambiance I was looking for and I would gladly recommend it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cynthia
review: Never had an issue with Yankee Candle before so I'm very disappointed. No scent. Can only smell it in Jar or if you're immediately next to it and even then it's very, very faint. definitely doesn't fill the air. Thinking the candle wasn't pored / manufactured correctly- I've let it burn to 1/3 of the jar- still nothing. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susulynne
review: I‚Äôm not sure about this scent and if it will smell. The scented oil from candle leaked in jar, lid and outside of the jar. Not sure what happened or if candle was stored too long. I did light it and it does smell, but, I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs pumpkin spice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: X
review: I was a bit skeptical to buy another candle from Amazon. The previous candle I purchased from Amazon was melted to one side of the jar (I was able to melt the wax and reset the wick). And I've read the reviews about similar melted candle problems, and people complaining about no scent. But I'm very happy with this purchase. This candle arrived in perfect condition and has plenty of scent. Exactly what I expected it to be.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: G.K. Ray
review: I have been a loyal customer of Yankee Candle for years. I love their products; the scents are always perfectly concentrated for me to enjoy the holiday season especially. I appreciate their willingness to replace my deliveries twice. However, I will NO LONGER buy their candles online. As wondrous as their products are, their package team leaves much to be desired. Every order and complimentary replacement arrived broken. Package glass better, please! Thank you for the replacements, but get it together.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mellowjade
review: I got 2 of these but I have to say - they really lack in scent. Not sure if I got an old batch or what but they weren't what I expected. I find that some Yankee candles just lack in general so that could be the case with this particular scent. Won't purchase again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: I bought Autumn Wreath so that my living room could be infused with a holiday scent.  The candle is basically a red candle in a jar with zero scent.  It has a slight scent when you get your nose right up to it--but then you risk burning it off.  I really regret this purchase --stay away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Christina Vasquez
review: Disappointed this candle arrived damaged and melted. I was planning to give this as a gift but will need to return it. Next time, I‚Äôll take the time to go into the Yankee store or order online. I‚Äôve never had issues when ordering directly from Yankee but was trying to avoid having to go to the mall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jeff
review: I love the scent of this candle because it smells like Christmas.  I actually used a candle warmer to melt it.  I use it in the months of Oct-Jan. I even had a co-worker to step in and say it smells like Christmas because she could smell it in the hallway...she loved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: A reader
review: This scent is warm and welcoming and works for both fall and the holidays. I like the Yankee Candles because the scents seem to be high quality and I'm often over-sensitive to perfumes. They also last a long, long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susan B. Southwell
review: The price was great and I love the scent. Arrived the next day!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: ELM
review: Overall, I really like the candles from Yankee Candle. This candle has a really good blend of both apple, and pumpkin spice scents. I would 100% buy these again for burning at home during the fall & Holiday seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cory
review: Yep, it was probably from leftover stock, but it was perfectly fine. Smells like Caramel Apple, had a nice wafting aroma Well-boxed, no problems with shipping I would recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amber
review: The candle scent is amazing, however it isn't really giftable due to the packaging. Wherever it came from must have been warm, because the wax has bled into the lid. So it doesn't have an attractive appearance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: L. Amundsen
review: I love Yankee Candles, and I like Midsummer's Night, but I ordered Cranberry Chutney. I'm not dealing with the hassle of a return during Christmas, so I'm glad I at least like the scent I  got.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kate Cullen
review: Candle wax was melted and slid as it resolidified  so it covers most the wick. The lid didn't seal good because its lined with melted wax. It fell off as I was moving the candle and it shattered! The wax is all bubbly. Not sure if i will be able to salvage this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Mark
review: This is the third time buying this candle. I bought two last year and gifted one of them. This year, it was gifted as a birthday present. This scent couldn‚Äôt describe fall any better!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: L. Kulczycki
review: Love Yankee Candles!  Lasts a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Sally D.
review: I ordered 2 Cranberry Chutney large jar candles, the boxes were labeled on the outside with Cranberry Chutney but when I opened them they were both Midsummer's Night.  I don't know if I like them, not sure I want 4 of them if I try to order again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: AL
review: candle came undamaged, burned it for about 3 hours and it filled half the house with great cinnamon and apples smell. burns slower and has stronger scent than box store candles. Am saving it to burn Thanksgiving thru Christmas to fill house with a holiday scent.  very pleased and worth the 18.88 price

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Wevsbell
review: Scent is really nice, one of the things I look forward to in the fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Lisa
review: this came with some liquified oily residue that had seeped thru the inner packing, and was all over my hands when I took it out. I burned it for 4 hours and no smell AT ALL even standing over it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Alison
review: I was nervous to buy this after seeing some reviews stating it was knock off. But my candle came in the jar as pictured, and has a great scent. I think it‚Äôs great for fall and wintertime !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kelly T
review: I remember when a Yankee candle could fill a room with fragrance.  Not this particular candle.  I smell the smoke more when I blow it out than when I burn the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Amazon Customer
review: Delivery driver was great.  He noticed some wax that leaked out of my box and suggested I open it immediately in case it the jar was cracked.  It wasn't,  the candle was packed upside down and Florida heat made the candle st as it to leak out from poorly placed lid. I was thinking about ordering more prior to this delivery as presents , but not after this experience. I didn't return it because it was still functional but just not pretty.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Nani
review: These are by far the best fragrant Candle out there I buy them every year and use them daily They make a great gift and your house smells amazing Great Great Great Love them

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: strawberry23d
review: I had this candle burning since about 6am. It's now about noon and I get a very faint smell of cranberry. This was a good price but I'm not sure I'm going to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jacklyn and Eduardo
review: Not sure why it don't smell st all when lit but sure has a lot of black smoke coming from it.my other on is perfect not sure why this one's not smelling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Tyler
review: I‚Äôve been buying yankee candles for years! This has absolutely no scent whatsoever!!! Very disappointed!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: H Steiner
review: I‚Äôve always liked Yankee candles because they lasted long and they always had a very nice scent.  Now sure what has happened to Yankee but this will be my last purchase of this brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Kat
review: This is a Wonderful candle! Long lasting. and smells so much like autumn. It fill's my home with forever scent. Yes, Recommend this Candle 100 percent. AAA+++

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Didi
review: I love the smell.  The product was well packed and it arrived on a timely manner even tho it was shipped to a military base. Thank you so much!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Cindy T
review: It arrived melted but we‚Äôre able to use it. I should have known better than ordering a candle to me delivered in Arizona.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: AFT
review: I love the smell but it‚Äôs not enough to fill a room with an aroma, which I love and why I buy candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: tstuckey
review: Smells amazing for a long period of time! Perfect for a gift! I absolutely love Yankee Candles! Wished I had the funds to only use just that‚Ä¶. YANKEE PRODUCTS!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Susan M. Booker
review: This candle was not up to the quality of the previous one (same kind) that I purchased. It was unevenly colored and the scent was not as strong (although just as lovely). Glad I didn‚Äôt purchase it as a gift for someone. Something must have happened to it in transit or it was poorly stored at the warehouse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jax Naydol
review: The sun is a very nice fall sent but it doesn't smell up the living room it could probably smell up a bathroom but it's not as strong as they used to be. I've been searching for a strong scented candle and I just can't seem to find one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Jan Bolding
review: This was not in good condition when I got it.  It was a gift for my daughter and she told me it broke easily after she got it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: weezeee
review: Yankee candles are quite a bit more expensive than other generic ones that looks the same.  But the scent is much nicer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Starlena Profitt
review: Love the way this candle smelled. It didn't seem to last as long as other Yankee Candles I've gotten but it smelled great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large 2-Wick Tumbler Candle, Spiced Pumpkin
author: Faye
review: I am not usually a fan of Yankee Candles, but I was purchased by so many reviews. When I opened the package, I noticed the scent was mild, and when lit, the candle didn‚Äôt put out any scent at all! And of course, it isn‚Äôt returnable!! Do not waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: 1crazycute
review: I usually love Yankee candles because they do give out a good scent that fills up the room, but, this particular scent does nothing. The only time you are able to smell it, is when you are standing right next to it. I want to be able to walk into my living room and smell the candle....so, I am very disappointed to say the least. I will probably never buy a Yankee candle again. Better Homes candles  and Tuscany candles are a 100 percent better and they are cheaper. 12/28/2022 update: I read an article today on Google news, stating that the reason that people are putting bad reviews regarding there being no smell to some of the Yankee candles, is because it's one of the symptoms of having Covid...having no smell...LMAO!! You got to be kidding me right?! I truly hope it's not Amazon coming up with that lame excuse for their candles having no smell....I can tell you that I did not have Covid while burning their candle....MY CANDLE THAT I PURCHASED HAD NO SCENT UNLESS I WAS SUPER CLOSE TO IT. I KNOW I DIDNT HAVE COVID BECAUSE AFTER LIGHTING ONE OF MY OTHER CHEAP CANDLES, AFTER BEING DISAPPOINTED WITH THE YANKEE CANDLE, I WAS VERY MUCH ABLE TO SMELL IT JUST FINE!! It's sad that Google or Amazon have to make such ridiculous excuses because of having bad reviews on their candles....pretty pathetic actually!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: steven p. welty
review: Is this an authentic Yankee candle? I question it because I've burned these candles for 40 years and this candle has absolutely no sense at all. It's been burning for an hour and by now the house should have been full of aroma. However, I could put my nose right over the candle and not smell a thing but wax. Disappointed! Never experienced this with, a Yankee candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: None
review: Really disappointed that this candle came melted and in a glob in the container with no wick!  Looks like it was either made wrong, or stored wrong.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gina G-Lover
review: I ordered this twice. My first candle arrived broken. I did a live chat with an Amazon representative because I didn‚Äôt think it was safe to bring broken glass into a Amazon return center & she said yes, to do it. She asked me if I wanted her to do the return & I said ‚Äúno thanks‚Äù which I‚Äôm glad I did because she was WRONG about telling me to return this broken glass. I did the return on Amazon myself & they told me not to return it that they would replace it. So my replacement comes & the top of the candle is uneven because it melted some. See photos for both. Now if your a candle burner then you know burning  a candle with an uneven top is going to continue to burn unevenly & can even get to the point where your not even done with the candle & you no longer can burn it because the wicks get buried. So I returned the second one & just gave up! I ordered it in Nov/Dec. & it‚Äôs not hot where I live in those months! Good luck & hope your experience goes better then mine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: S76JT
review: My son was so excited to purchase me a Yankee Christmas Candle this year. He knows how powerful Yamnkee candles are But not this year... No scent at all once burned. Very disappointing to open this year for Christmas. I'm Not Happy with this years Yankee candle üòí. I want a refund or another scented stronger smelling candle. Last year the same candle had my whole room smelling Amazing. Don't know what happened to this year's batch. Maybe this is an off brand Amazon is selling this year. But it's not cool I'm very disappointed. And it has nothing to do with covid nor my scent of smells. All lies üò´ üòï.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: RH24
review: I'm likely upon the last 2-3 hours of burn time on my candle...so I have stopped using it and ordered two more to have in place to use Christmas Eve/day. This smell is not overbearing and is pleasant. I have to order fom Amazon as the Yankee Candle store in our area has closed :( I highly recommend this candle you would not be unhappy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: master Irrigator
review: The candle arrived well packaged so that it would not break.  I have only burnt it for 1 evening so far and it smells great. Not much more you can say. It melted evenly across the candle.  Not the strongest scent. So if you want a super strong scent then this is not it. It is very inviting. Best price i had seen around for this size.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Texas mom
review: When the Christmas Cookie candles were $14 for Black Friday, I bought two. A friend gave me one in this scent years ago and it's lovely- it's a super nice vanilla scent (among other things I can't put my finger on). The large jar candles last a long time, so this should carry us through the Christmas season. Great buy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Susan Copenhagen
review: I had a small one in my office at work and anyone coming in looked around for the cookies. It was fun just watching. Great sent on a cool day for welcoming home. üòã yum.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Kaitlen
review: The media could not be loaded. I should‚Äôve known this would happen honestly, it doesn‚Äôt smell all that great but it‚Äôs definitely ‚ÄúChristmas-ie.‚Äù I‚Äôm having to boil this, just so I could have something to give to my mom for her Christmas present (I‚Äôm 17 btw). DO NOT bother buying candles from Amazon, try bath and body works site, or an actual candle site. This is very annoying and I‚Äôm pretty upset rn lol‚Ä¶ this is my first BAD review ever

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Sam
review: I was worried it would come melted like other reviews, but was perfect! I ordered this along with several other yankee candles for Christmas gifts. Each came packaged in a yankee candle box and a protective sleeve. All were in perfect condition. None melted and all smelled very good. Very Happy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: karrie jones
review: I have NEVER been so disappointed in Yankee candle before! Used to the smell permeated the room like fresh baked cookies! I can barely even smell this candle and there is no lingering scent cause there was none in the beginning!! I was so excited to get this and to pay $20 for crap! I will NEVER buy a Yankee candle again in my life! I wish I hadn‚Äôt lit it cause I would love to return it or throw it in the trash! It‚Äôs just so sad an disappointing! Awful! Awful awful!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Lauren
review: I bought two of these candles. You can tell they‚Äôre old. They have practically no smell at all. As someone who used to work for Yankee Candle I‚Äôm extremely displeased. These candles are expensive and you want quality with what you‚Äôre paying for. This is not it. I suggest taking your money to your nearest ALDI and buying a 3 wick Huntington Home candle for 5 dollars that is better quality than this. Very unsatisfied customer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Western WA Resident.
review: I love the smell...but this particular candle wasn't sealed when I received it.. Plus the wax was melted off to one side.. I still have access to the wick so I am going to try and get it to burn right...but people should really keep wax away from heat?? Or remember that it needs to COOL before it's actually packaged..And if there's quality checks, this one was missed.  The more private people sell on Amazon, the worse the items are these days...

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Laura E Moretti
review: My kitten has sensitivity to many essential oils. I have found this scent doesn't bother Sparkle Lissa at all. I've had to give away other candles due to Sparkle's sensitivity. The price was better than any other Yankee Candles I've purchased anywhere.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: TB
review: Yankee used to be top notch. I am very dissatisfied now. Packaging was padded so they did not arrive broken but they hardly have any scent. I will not be purchasing any more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Patricia A. Lamb
review: I like this candle very much. The size is perfect.  I will be using it for Christmas, and the scent is just like having Christmas cookies baking in the house. I have enjoyed it so much that I ordered another one as a Christmas gift. Thank you so much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jen Malcom
review: If this is a Yankre candle, then they messed up!  There is NO scent!  I gave it to my roommate, and they lit it, but you can't even smell it!  Don't buy, unless you just like the look of a lit candle!  I want my money back!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Gina Benedict
review: This candle was a great price and with it smelling so good, I just might have to keep it instead of giving it away üòÜ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Shannon
review: I guess returns aren't checked.  This candle evidently was returned MELTED and resold to me.  It was melted sideways, like still in box.  No wick to be found.  Another candle i got was fine.  This one returned.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Wendi. Oregon. Nana
review: Love my new yankee candle. The fragrance is strong but not overpowering. Lasts longer than my bed bath and beyond candles. Would have given it a 5 but I think candles cost too much in general.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: lattecat
review: Love this scent and I'm so glad they have kept it all these years.  Great for holidays, house guests and for using when buyers come to look at your home when you are ready to sell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: emily brown
review: smells the whole house up of imitation cookie.. it's gets a little sickening after a couple hrs and  I have to put it out. I ordered a red apple Christmas candle that has no smell. I'm writing a review on that one too

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Jkwell
review: I needed more of these. It leaves the most pleasant, cozy smell in my home while I'm working or reading or watching netflix. It's what you would imagine if you were baking.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Bash
review: Can hardly smell anything, smells like burning wax.  Usual Yankee scent is missing.  No Covid if entire gathering can‚Äôt smell after opening it brand new abs lighting??!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Amazon Customer
review: My favorite scent, smells like home cooked Christmas cookies. Highly recommend, unable to find locally when out of season. Candle very securely packed, received in excellent condition with prompt delivery.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Chase L
review: Yankee is the best candle, hands down: best long-lasting but not overwhelming scent!  And at Amazon's price, it's an excellent value.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: CZMom
review: Smells delicious but pretty shattered. Amazon will send another one soon. Thank you, Amazon. This item is a gift I need by 12/15.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie
author: Charlotte
review: I like the 1 wick candles because they don‚Äôt overpower a room.  This is a very sweet scent yet mellow with only one wick.  Great value.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar, Christmas Cookie

review: I buy this candle every Christmas for gifts. The scent is so delicious! Lasts for months even if you burn it everyday .

The scent's pretty strong, to the point it smells almost like those really buttery cookies you get out of the thing most people now call the sewing tin. 10/10 would order again next December!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Mihaela C
review: I am an absolute fan of candles, and Yankee candle was always one of my favorite brands. I tried so far most of their scents, and I enjoy some more, some less.. I feel like this specific scent doesn‚Äôt have a personality, nor a strong perfume that will linger around the house the whole day. I was excited to try it and light it right after I received it but turned it off just as fast and it has been sitting there since that day. Won‚Äôt buy again, but I would definitely try other Yankee candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Paul C.
review: Still some of the best candles in the world I have my dresser top half full of candles and these are some of the best. Literally I have nine candles and that‚Äôs only on my dresser not counting the ones in the kitchen as well this will not be the last one I buy because there‚Äôs way too many scents to choose from. I highly recommend if you buy candles by these different sense shapes and sizes. Paul C

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Lisajc66
review: I just bought this to put in a gift basket for my sister-in-law who is doing a beach theme in her bathroom in her new apartment. I had no idea what this particular scent smelled like. I've bought several Yankee Candles before, but have never smelled this one so I had to go off the reviews and chance it, and I'm so glad I went with it!! It smells incredibly GOOD and goes with her beach theme!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: David Gomez
review: I dont buy many candles and I have been experimenting on different brands to try to find my fav.  This isnt it.  The smell isnt there.  I've even had it going for nearly and hour and invited my friend and they said they couldnt tell the candle was there

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Mr Floaty.
review: I'd really like to rate this higher, based singularly on the scent, and the lasting aroma... but when the glass jar  cut me up when opening the inner packaging, I felt like I should share the experience. I did NOT contact the seller, and am currently using the candle in another container. I really wish it wasn't broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: D F
review: Scent is good and stronger than some other brands. I compare Yankee candle scent strength with bath and body works candle scent strength for those familiar with bath and body works. Other scented candles are so subtle, you don't know a candle is burning. You can definitely smell these and it's a nice scent, not overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Norma Searls
review: It was so nice to get my candle that wasn't broken to pieces, The carrier was very nice and didn't just throw it on my porch, the last one soon as you move the box from outside you could hear it all broke, thanks to whoever delivered it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: Mark
review: If you want to bring a scent of the beach to your living room or kitchen, this is the scent. I have bought three off of Amazon so far and have purchased five or six more from department stores. This is a great summer smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: lawanda green
review: My last candle I sent back it had no scent. The new candle scent was way stronger. I immediately could smell the scent from the unopened box. The aroma quickly filled my entire home and burns and smells beautiful. Thank you Yankee!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Bahama Breeze
author: A. F. Goldfadim

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Just sayin'..
review: I have had this scent for almost 20 years, give it take. The last one I had was bought about 5ish years ago and cycled seasonly with other Yankee Candles. It definitely always had a cinnamon smell but not like this. This one is almost satirical! This Home Sweet Home candle has such an exaggerated cinnamon smell, it burns the throat to smell it! You'll notice I made a point to let it be known I haven't bought a HSH Yankee candle in about 5 years. I did that incase Yankee has changed the formula to increase the Cinnamon. Or maybe it was a mistake buying on Amazon? Maybe it's a second? Or maybe I am just getting old and my olfactory glands are 'going' first? The only problem with the latter is the previous HSH candle I had was at it's wicks end and I was able to compare. So if it's my olfactory senses, they went haywire overnight. Yankee offers candles with Cinnamon in the name to let it be known cinnamon is what you're going to get. Wow, if they are more 'cinnamony' than this, it would double as a tear gas agent. Just imagine putting a Yankee cinnamon candle on a warmer during the holidays. One could clear out any family or friend visitors from sheer discomfort alone! This HSH is more than half way there. One could use this to politely clear any guests out of the home. It's just too much!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: RSS
review: The scent is good if you like a really spicey aroma. I am not too happy about it but I hope the person I give it to likes the scent. Because it smells so spicey, I would recommend using it in a kitchen, breakfast room or dining room. I bought this to give to someone for a housewarming gift because the name of the candle is Home Sweet Home. I was very happy with the way this candle was packaged. It was wrapped very well in a shell of fitted cardboard and then boxed. It was delivered quickly and was completely intact, which is great because the candle is in a glass jar. I think this candle was too expensive, but I think all Yankee Candles are too expensive. I wish Yankee Candle would make more candle scents for housewarming gifts and name them accordingly.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Lori K
review: The two candles I bought are sitting in the exact spot I always put the candles I buy directly from Yankee. Even so, they burned down the middle like cheap candles.  I had to scrap the wax off the sides to fill in the cavern. That helped somewhat build the sides, but the wick is spent.  Huge waste of money. They smell great and look great until you start using them. Reviews on the Yankle Candle website show the same poor quality feedback. I contacted Yankee Xandke and was told the Amazon Store that's called Yankee Candke isn't Yankee Candle. So, no guarantees.  And the Amazon "Yankee Candle" won't reply.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Kindle Customer
review: Very disappointed. I don't buy many Yankee candles because they are too expensive for my budget. I splurged on this one since it is Christmas season. I love the Christmas smell of balsam and the spicy scent of cloves. This candle has very little scent (had scent the first time I burned it but that has faded out) and what it has smells more like baby powder. Absolutely no clove scent at all and no balsam scent either. I paid almost $30 for this candle and it will it in the closet because it's pretty worthless as to making the house smell nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Maria Hull
review: I had received this scent of candle 22 years ago as a gift‚Ä¶.. the smell is as stated ‚Äúhome sweet home‚Äù. 22 years later I‚Äôm still buying it. This is the first time I‚Äôve gotten it from Amazon, and was a bit hesitant. If you are, don‚Äôt be!!! It was packaged beautifully, and soundly. The quality is all YANKEE, and it fills the house will amazing smell!! Great candle. I‚Äôll definitely be buying more scents from Amazon in the future.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Renee
review: As for Yankee Candles, excellent in all regards! I recommend for any reason! Sorry to say that (1) one of the (2) two candles I ordered were broken upon delivery. I heard the glass shards rattling in the (1) one box when I picked it up in the mail room. I am not going to ask for a refund/replacement this time, but will if it happens on the next. This is unusual for me to experience in all my 15 years of an Amazon cutomer.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Gary B. Sessa
review: It's been burning now for about two hours and I still don't get cinnamon wafting through the house. It smelled really good when I first opened it, but unless you are right over the candle, you wouldn't know it's burning. Big disappointment. I imagine the longevity is the same as the other Yankee candles; however, I do not recommend buying it since the scent is so weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: michaeldj5
review: This is absolutely the last time I will buy a Yankee Candle Sparkling Cinnamon candle. I am appalled at the lack of scent this thing puts out. The candle smells so nice when it's unlit. But, as soon as you start burning it, it produces virtually no scent whatsoever. My Bath & Body Works cinnamon-scented candle fills the room with scent. I'll stick with them from here on out. I wish I could return this pathetic candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: lvd Zwaag
review: This is one of my favorite holiday/winter candles. Guests often comment about how my home smells when I have it burning. I have an open livingroom/diningroom/kitchen space and it can fragrant the space. It may be a bit strong if in a smaller space. I've always had a lot of success with my purchase of Yankee candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Evefalling
review: The scent just isn't there.  It smelled great when I first got it, but as it burns,  it loses it scent.  Won't buy this one again.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Uboatman
review: These candles (I would assume all under the brand name of Yankee Candle) have far too much soot and debris while burning.  For the price; unacceptable.  Potentially an airborne contaminant.  Recommend consumers look for a product with less smoke, soot and debris.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Angela
review: I purchased this candle to have a lovely scent over Christmas. However, it did not have a strong scent. No, I'm not sick and I can smell everything just fine and I'm not Covid or Omicron infected like everyone is blaming it on. Not happy with this weak candle!! Will not purchase again!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Sekhmet
review: Very little scent . The candle wax was in 3 or 4 layers rather than solid . I don‚Äôt know if Yankee sold them to Amazon just to get rid of a damaged product or if the separation of wax was actually due to improper storage .

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Dino Bravo
review: I read the reviews and figured I‚Äôd give the Sparkling Cinnamon a shot. Quite disappointed. The flame flickers heavily producing an extra amount of stinky smoke and the cinnamon smell is nonexistent.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Stormy
review: I bought 4 different scents and none have any scent when they are lit. I wanted an Eucalyptus candle and they were almost $25 and now they are over $35. They have got to be kidding.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: Retail Therapist
review: Evidently candle was stored in very hot environment. Unable to light wick, definitely NOT appropriate  as a gift. Red wax melted on top staining it.

review: I love two wick yankee candle they just put the sent in the room twice as fast. The price is great. I refuse to pay the going price. I'd live without. I love spice sent at Christmas and actually all year. I also love cinnamon and the lilac. Smell like the real thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice

I had burned a different brand of candle shortly before this one and it smelled wonderful. I've tried setting it on a table right next to my chair and I still can't smell it. Huge disappointment and waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1218400Z Large Jar Candle Kitchen Spice
author: kevin walters
review: Like everything about this candle. Price, scent. Great purchase and I'm extremely happy.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: LS
review: Really disappointed with us Mel. I am a lemon free, I like the freshness and zest of lemon. I tried it for after the New Year to get rid of all the Christmas smells, and I actually had the blow it out. I am not one of those fuzzy people who complains, I love candles oh, but this one was actually sickening. I kept trying to decide what it smelled like, and it smell like a gas station bathroom with one of those air fresheners. No I didn't return it, I don't believe in just returning things because you're unhappy with a smell, but I am disappointed with Yankee Candle for that. I wish descriptions were more realistic and believable. You can't know a smell until you buy the stupid thing, and that's twenty bucks down the drain

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Sunny417
review: This was a blind purchase and I'm glad I took the chance. I was worried it was going to smell like furniture polish, but it is a lovely fruity lemon scent almost like kids cereal. Very pleased!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: CheeryToes
review: I was really expecting this candle to have more of a cilantro scent, the idea of the candle is great, the reality is a heavily pineapple scented candle that makes me rather nauseous. I waited a year or two for the price to drop on this when it did I snapped it up - what a disappointment - I cannot recommend this scent. blech

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Ranger
review: Have enjoyed these candles for many years. It was a nice surprise to see some of the scents here on Amazon for far less than retail at their stores. Of course, not all inventory was available but I found three that I like. Highly recommend purchasing these Yankee Candles on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: paulinespens
review: This smell of this candle is horrific. It isn't no where near a fruity, Happy smell. I lit the candle soon as I got it. I was so excited. Lemon is one of my favorite smells. It burned for a few hours as I did my own thing around the house. I realized I hasn't smelled lemon yet so I went to check the candle. Whatever you used for this candle please never use it again. The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: K. M. Benjamin
review: I can smell this wonderful apple scent ! Which I believe means I don‚Äôt have COVID . Who knew that candles could be so important in the fight against it. Of course the shipping was super fast and the product was careful bundled to make it to me !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: A. Hassan
review: I am very sensitive to air fresheners and scented things, in general-- including most YC scents. This one smells clean and light and does not make me wheeze. The lid fits tightly enough to keep in all the "post candle extinguishing smoke of death".

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: ernest g ruiz
review: I bought this candle a while back ( not from amazon ) , beautiful aroma.I ordered the same candle form Amazon, and as you can see in photos it's damaged.The Amazon customer service is excellent and they are sending me a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Christine
review: I normally buy this candle directly from Yankee candle but I wanted it sooner so I ordered it on Amazon because of the price I was totally disappointed that this candle did not even fill my living room with the scent would definitely  not by again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Michael Kopecky
review: This product comes badly packaged off Amazon shipping and will easily break like mine did the second you open it.  It also smells absolutely disgusting, worse than any artificial lemon scent I‚Äôve ever smelled!  What a waste of my money!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Erin
review: I love this sweet citrusy smell. I know it's meant for summer, but I like to burn it with the windows open on a cool day. It's a nice scent to air out the room, especially on cleaning days, when it covers cleaning sprays' scents subtly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: mady b.
review: I ran out of a candle with this particular scent and was glad to find it on amazon for such a great deal. I‚Äôve already been burning it for hours and it still smells as amazing as it did at first and barely any wax has melted so I know this will last a long amount of time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: LilMar
review: I've been buying McIntosh for many years. Great throw, and it smells like fresh, crunchy apples..... Just apples. Perfect scent in September when the orchards are harvesting.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Nicholette Corn
review: When you smell the candle up close it smells great. However there is no throw of the scent. You can‚Äôt even tell it is burning when you walk by. I would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Steven Doyle
review: Disappointed had high stars and reviews but I have a snall apartment left candle on came home 4 hours later and when I walked in there wasn't even a scent....garbage

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Abhija
review: Please do urself a Favor and skip this buy. Its just waste of money there is ZERO throw on burn not even know what the‚Ä¶ is this it literally smells nothing normally there is good ..ok..bad smell .. but this is like there is nothing even after a good 2hr burnüôÑ

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Jacqueline D.
review: I love Yankee candles, the Macintosh Apple scent smells fresh like real apples. I just wish they'd burn longer. I get the large jar and burn it continuously so they don't last very long in my home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Tiffany
review: Definitely melted at one point of its transit life. You can see that the wax even partially melted in to the lid. The wick is barely there. Smells great though

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Gallant
review: I ordered this candle and it came broken. Amazon replaced it (thank you). My replacement smells great. I like this fragrance over the holidays. Will buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Pamela H.
review: This is a memory from way back. This Blueberry Yankee Candle means so much to me. I had some about 30 years ago and bought one for a Christmas gift for my wonderful brother.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: BAK
review: I have used many scents of Yankee candles.  I am using an evergreen scent just now.  I got this one for a friend who loves fruit scents.  It is a great gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought these on a sale for $10.  They came individually boxed and perfect for gift giving. Love the lemon scent.  Burn great.  A+

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: kayrn brumley
review: Smells wonderful...just like every Yankee I've bought before. I will add that I've never had covid, so my sense of smell is still 100%. Love your products!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Minidonut
review: Pictures shown what I received. The wax spilled off one side and it covered the candle wick. I had to melt the wax around the wick for a while in order for it to light. It can not be gifted anymore, but I do like the scent. It's smell of citrus scent and last long in my kitchen. I love all the Yankee candles; especially this scent in my kitchen. It keeps my kitchen smell fresh and odor-free

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: jason ryan
review: I like the smell, I had this candle before and had to get another one. It was more than I wanted to pay for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: SMB
review: This is one of my favorite scents from Yankee Candle.  Makes you think that you're apple picking on a sunny fall day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Michelangelo
review: wish I didn't have to blast it with a torch lighter to get the sides to melt evenly, not a big deal, it's kind of fun, but probably not the best trait for a candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Riq
review: This candle will literally last you months if you don‚Äôt constantly burn it. Even if you do it will still last long and the smell is amazing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Tmat360
review: The candle smelled great in the paper bag package, but it wasn't wrapped in bubble wrap or in a cardboard candle holder so the glass tumbler that held the candle was broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smelled great when I got it out of the box. I lit the candle and it smells like old laundry detergent . The lemon scent completely disappeared . This was for the Sicilian lemon scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Daniel koski
review: We ordered the Macintosh candle. When we got it, the initial smell was amazing. Exactly what we wanted. But by the 2nd or 3rd day the smell wasn‚Äôt there anymore? It was more faint than strong. I saw in the reviews that others were having that issue with the smell as well but I figured we‚Äôd give it a chance. Kinda disappointed in it. Gonna be trying it out in a smaller space such as a bathroom.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Retail Therapist
review: Bit less throw than usual but worth the price. Arrived well packed and intact. Good gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: The Wolf
review: The wick is too low, the candle goes out. It is nearly full and I can't use it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Mango Peach Salsa
author: Jeana Lee Paccasassi
review: No scent! What a waste of $30 bucks! I‚Äôm sending back or asking for a credit.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Deborah
review: I love my yankee candle. I have sinus problems so finding a candle I can smell is difficult. I lift the lids in the stores & if I can‚Äôt smell it I won‚Äôt buy it. Yankee candles have always had a great scent. I had a woman come over once when I had the lid off the jar as she came up my stairs she said ‚ÄúThank Heaven , Scented candles‚Äù The previous place she went smelled like cats and dogs. I knew that person and she always has a very clean house. I had a cat myself but she couldn‚Äôt smell any cat smells. I keep a clean litter box because I cannot live with the smell. It gets cleaned after every use and taken outside to the trash . The other lady taught me that so I know her litter was clean. The candles make a huge difference.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Bargnhtress
review: Horrible!!!  I have been buying a lot of Yankee Candles from Amazon lately because of the deals they have been having.  I bought over a dozen in the last month here but have been buying them for over 30 years.  This one just about made me gag!  It smells like rotten burnt coconut shells!  Gross!!!  I gave it a good try but will be returning it.  I love most of the others but this one is like burning rotten garbage in the back of a smoothie shop!  It smells like they let tropical fruit rot and then juiced them and added it to the wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: JPB
review: I have this candle on scheduled regular delivery.  The last batch had very minimal fragrance.  No, it has nothing to do with sense of smell being affected by covid.  I bought a different brand scented candle from the store in place of this purchase. It's scented and the aroma was just perfect.  I can smell it and it emitted a wonderful scent. I had several people try smelling the Yankee candle.  Each and everyone said there was hardly any aroma.  Please stop making excuses.  Someone.dropped the ball and covid was just an easy excuse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Serpico16
review: As stated, the wife got me hooked on fragrant candles.  Lived half of my life without an opinion either way, don't know how I ever managed. Must admit, this Lilac Blossom scent is simply excellent.  A definite favorite of ours. Yankee Candle (JAR TYPE) are a favorite of ours.  Price is right too. We like aromatic candles that last.  Some are very expensive and yet, I have to put my beak practically into the flame in order to recognize a hint of an aroma.  Big League Taboo for this 52 yr old kids beak, as I blister easily not to mention the discolored tip which is generally black or in a shade thereof. Not to mention it simply does nothing for my looks. But not with these Large Jar Yankee Candles with so much aroma. My beak is safe at last. Thank you Yankee Candle.  My beak thanks you too.  ;)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: M
review: I purchased this candle days ago and it has no scent at all!!! I just contacted customer service to get a refund and return the item but the associates didn't help. They will "contact" me in 24hrs by email regarding this issue. No questions about the item and truly no assistance at all. Yankee candles have a strong scent and this thing has none. Only the bottle with the name stating is a real Yankee candle which is definitely not!!!!! Scammer whoever sells this crap!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Kimberly S.
review: I love Yankee candle‚Äôs. This one has a very nice lite sent. It will not overwhelm you or overtake your home. I really like having this one in the bathroom when I take my bubble baths. Such a relaxing addition. The first candle I purchased the glass was cracked. I informed customer service and a second candle was at my back door the next day. You really can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee candle‚Äôs. Such good quality and such amazing customer service. I highly recommend them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Michele F
review: I grew up with fresh lilac bushes and have always enjoyed Yankee Candles (my favorites are Macintosh apple and Vanilla cupcake). I bought this expecting the same level of fragrance. While it does have a strong scent (which is why I buy the two wick candles), it doesn't smell anything like fresh lilac, rather it smells like an old lady's bathroom soap. Won't be purchasing this scent again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: PepPep2
review: I'm relatively picky about rose-scented goods and usually want something that is as "natural-scented" as possible. This candle exceeds my expectation and really does smell like fresh cut roses. It's not overpowering and smells clean and easy. The size is also pretty big so this candle should last a very long time as well. The seller also delivered the item with a lot of care and arrived the next day after ordering via Prime. Awesome!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Lori
review: This candle does not look like the photo‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a very dark purple. Also the smell is off, not that lovely lavender/vanilla scent. I can‚Äôt even describe the smell. I would not recommend this.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: T Rav
review: Looks crusty on top and color is not consistent. Bought for a gift but I would be embarrassed to give it looking like this. When I order from Amazon I don‚Äôt expect to receive seconds but it seems to be a thing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: WarriorMom22
review: My daughter absolutely loves the smell of Yankee Candle Pink Sands! It has a strong throw that I find a little overwhelming in an area like a small bathroom, but it doesn't bother my daughter one bit. The scent incorporates citrus, fruity, floral, woodsy, and musk all in one. My daughter has loved this scent for over 2 years, and still isn't tired of it. I got her another one for Christmas. :)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Amazon Customer
review: a lot of the reviews are saying it's not good/fake/came broken but I ordered two large jar lilac candles and they were wrapped HELLA safely and smell amazingggg if u want to get it, get it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: T. Stacy
review: This candle is outstanding and will make the perfect gift for anyone who loves candles. The sent is strong and last long after its put out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Hummingbird Fan
review: This is one of my FAVORITE scents that Yankee Candle has during Fall/Halloween time. This year I had to buy it from Amazon, because Yankee didn‚Äôt release it for Halloween. I was told they just weren‚Äôt going to this year. Well they must have gotten the hint that people weren‚Äôt happy, cause they did a month later and on sale. But I had gotten mine from here so‚Ä¶but I‚Äôm still very happy I get them!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: J. W.
review: Beach walk is my favorite scent in the Yankee Candle lineup. It has a bright scent profile with floral undertones that you can‚Äôt quite put your finger on. It is aptly named, too - the scent makes me think of a cozy beachfront house with the windows open on a cool day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Justin
review: All these people writing false reviews about yankee candles not smelling should be banned from reviewing. I have always and always will love these candles. Yes there are a few scents that are a bit to feminine for my taste but even they smell delectable. Yankee candle you get a 110% from me. I just wish I could afford them more often than I can.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: GLaSalla
review: As soon as you open the top of the jar it smells like I just got a dozen roses it is amazing seriously it came quickly I was perfectly boxed and I am enjoying every minute of it I highly recommend it I will definitely re-order this again for the fifth time

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Discerning Customer
review: This glass jar candle smells great! Unfortunately the glass jar arrived broken making it unusable. It is shipped to you at your risk. So good luck! It will be a great smelling and pleasant candle if it arrives in good condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: C. L. Cunningham
review: I like this candle for its pretty color reminiscent of the inside of a seashell and for its scent which is balanced and not overpowering (not too floral, not too citrus, not too spicy, not too musky). I find it pleasant and relaxing. This is a repeat purchase.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Jenny
review: Where's the scent?  We ordered the Gardenia but you can't smell it. Yankee candles use to be premium candles, but no more. Proof positive that price isn't always an indicator of good quality.  Very disappointing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Evefalling
review: Love the scent, it doesn't fade as candle burns.  Nice light slightly floral scent, . Burned down nicely, with scent strong the entire time. It does have a bit of zest to the smell that is invigorating,  yet calming also.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Lydia R Rogers
review: I love the scent of Pink Sands, it is the best! Hope they never discontinue this scent. It last a long time,  you don‚Äôt have to burn the candle a long time. Just let it pool after lighting then blow candle out. The scent last a long time‚Ä¶

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: April
review: 100% real Yankee candle! These candles are the absolute best. None came broken and the smell is exactly as if I‚Äôd bought it from a Yankee candle dealer. I will continue to buy more.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: Jeanette Emmert
review: The smell of the roses in this candle are absolutely amazing. We gave this as a gift, and the recipient was so excited to get it because it is her favorite scent. Lovely

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: nallely arias
review: I love this scent I hVe 3 dogs in the house and they make stuff stink sometimes this candel drowns out the smell of my 3 dogs its good and not too strong lasted 2 weeks had it burning a long time every day though it smells like a garden of flowers love love love deff recommend for a gift ‚ù§

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Pink Sands
author: MAWUTZ
review: Great smell

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: KC901
review: Looks nice and burns for a long time. Unfortunately very little scent. I have to be inches away in order to smell it. And NO I don't have covid, like other reviewers assume. For a direct comparison, I lit a $5 Balsam & Cedar candle from Aldi which smells lovely and filled a large living room. Maybe YC has a quality control issue? Hopefully I'll get a better scent next time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Lovin'Life
review: Normally, this brand has very highly scented candles. And this particular scent is usually very good to fill a room with scent quite quickly. But, I must have gotten a dud. It has no scent. Ok, maybe a very very faint scent, if you stick your nose in it. Which is difficult with fire. I even invited a neighbor over to check it. I thought I was losing my sense of smell and coming down with COVID. LOL. I bought the large two-wick tumbler. It says that I am buying from the Yankee Candle Company, but this particular one is sub-par for this company. Big waste of money. I will update if customer service responds.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
