author: Indigo
review: I ordered candles from Bath and Body Works but they were taking too long to get here. So I ordered this to give the house that Holiday smell. This candle has terrible scent throw. If you sniff the candle it has a scent but when you light it....nothing. And before you blame it on Covid, the Bath and Body Works candles came and 1 candle makes the whole downstairs smell heavenly! 0/10 would not recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Keith Jones
review: After our real Tree died two weeks after going up again for the 2nd year in a row, we ditched the real tree and picked up an artificial one. The downside is missing the scent of evergreen in the house... Well this candle eliminates the downside. The Balsam and Cedar Yankee Candle gives us that pine scent we were missing with an artificial tree.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Willie
review: Not at all what they used to be! I remember when these candles would fill the house. These barely fill a decent size room now! I bought 2 of the balsam and cedar to get into the holiday season. Ones in the living room and one is in a bathroom. Neither room gets any scent/smell. Even when you put your nose to the candles you can barely smell anything. I'll stick with Wood Wick!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Gamer Gal
review: I have purchased Yankee Candles in the past and have enjoyed many of the fragrances. THIS one however, called Balsam & Cedar is not good. To me, it smells like a mix between Pine Sol cleaner and wax. It reminds me of a hospital floor after just being mopped. I will still buy Yankee Candles with different scents but never this one again - wow.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Karrie S
review: I have bought Yankee Candles before and really liked them.  I am wondering about this 2 wick version.  First of all, it arrived with a large part of the candle shrunk away from the glass.  Very unattractive and one like this would never be put on the shelf in the store.  The fragrance is not very strong.  You can only smell it if you are close by.  That is not the room filling scent I recall.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: C. Rich
review: These candles smoke and have about a foot of throw. I‚Äôm grateful it wasn‚Äôt expensive.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Liquid Lab Fx
review: Yankee used to be the KING of candles. Now they just aren't.  Barley any scent. Burn pretty inconsistent. Overpriced. And No this is Covid related based on CNN. Or MSNBC. Bottom line there quality has gone way down.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Chicken Wing
review: Ordered these for my holiday table.  They arrived perfect and smell so good.  I loved saving so much money since I purchased from Amazon instead of the actual store.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: jamie
review: I guess growing up in the forest has my nose finely tuned because this thing smells like the worst cheapest pine toilet bowl cleaner. Yuck

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Renee R.
review: I wanted my home to smell like a real Christmas Tree and this was delivered. Love love love it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler
author: Karen T
review: One of my favorite scents is evergreen, so I‚Äôm picky. This candle meets my approval. Smells like Christmas.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

review: I like the smell. Notable is its lingetivity, it burns evenly, and would also make a nice gift.

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

product_title: Yankee Candle Balsam & Cedar Scented Candles, Large 2-Wick Tumbler

review: Love it-

review: This was packaged very well that it arrived in pristine condition. I've burned it a couple of days now for about 1-2 hours and the smell last for hours and you definitely smell in the room/house the next day as well. Will definitely buy again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Inadia xue
review: I know buying candles without smelling them is scary but this scent is great. It's a gentle apple without being "pier one" overpowering.  Just enough Christmas without smelling like pine-sol soaked cinnamon. I'll surely buy it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Tammy Jewell
review: Received the SAME DAY! Couldn't ask for better than that. The candles were well packaged. Price was better than in the stores, faster than ordering direct and still had a strong scent. I am very happy and would recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath
author: Audrey
review: Smells like hot wax with a hint of apple when burning. Looks like it was defective or oozed out in storage. Would never purchase this scent again, 2 other scents ordered at the same time seemed normal.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath

review: My first one arrived broken.  This seller replaced it immediately w no questions.  THANK YOU.  Great service & love this scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Red Apple Wreath

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus

I've burned them in big space and in little space, just to check, but they give off a faint scent  and only if you are standing right above them. I'm not sure if Yankee messed up or if these are knockoffs but what a disappointment, especially since I bought 4.  Color me sad. :(

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: D.
review: I saw this candle at a friends house and love the scent. My friend said her husband had the candle for 10 years. I went on Amazon and read the reviews. I noticed most people said the candle had a very faint smell and the scent wasn't as strong as it used to be. I was hoping the company had read the reviews and it had improved the scent. Unfortunately, this is not the case. My candle arrived yesterday. I had high hopes for this candle. This was my first time purchasing a Yankee Candle and I was looking forward to enjoying this scent in my home. I was sadly mistaken. This candle do not have a scent. I literally have to lean over the candle and even then I can barely smell anything. The scent fades so quickly that even when the candle is burning, you still can not hardly smell it. I paid $18.00 for this candle which more than I have ever paid for a candle before. I get stronger scented candles from the Dollar Tree that smell better than this one. I will never purchase this brand again. I don't recommend anyone to purchase this candle if you are looking for a decent smelling candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Senior Citizen
review: I bought this candle because Yankee Candles have always had a wonderful fragrance. The faint fragrance is okay, but barely detectable. Fragrance is the reason I bought this candle. I can buy candles with no fragrance a whole lot less than I paid for this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Scottyre
review: I have always liked Yankee candles. This is one of my favorite scents.  Their candles have always burned well for me and this is no exception.  I especially like the way they are packaged and shipped. There is no way they will arrive broken to your home. That is a huge factor for me.  I've purchased a couple different brands through Amazon that have arrived shattered. Only to have them replaced to have the replacement arrive shattered also. How does that? Yankee candle goes to great lengths to ensure their candles arrive to you just as they suppose to, all in one piece. This candle might be a bit strong smelling for some people, I however enjoy the deep woodsy smell this one gives off.  It's also a long burning candle.  Not one that you will light and then be almost empty  in a few short hours. I very much like that. No one likes spending extra money on a quality candle only to have it burn down in a few short hours.  Between the wonderful scents they have that are true to their name, and the longevity of their burn time, this has been bringing me back as a very happy repeat customer for years

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Got these on sale for $10.00 which seemed like a steal but these are definitely counterfeit yankee candles, scent is much weaker than original, stickers and serial number look off. Didn‚Äôt even think it was possible. Stay away from this seller. No wonder these were on sale. Original candle is on the right for comparison

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: J. Lopez
review: I haven't lit the wick yet but when I smell the scent of this candle right out of the jar it doesn't impress me at all.  The smell of this candle almost reminds me of bug spray and I'm tempted to throw this one out.  I'll update this review after I've had this candle lit for a few hours but until then I am not impressed. UPDATE- Well I've been burning this candle in our bathroom off and on for a few days now and I must admit that I don't mind this scent.  In my personal opinion it smells terrible straight from the jar but the scent that the candle releases when it's burning is actually pretty nice.  The scent isn't my all time favorite but I wouldn't mind purchasing this again.  As far as it's potency goes,  I was expecting this candles scent to be a bit stronger, especially since this candle is a Yankee candle so I'm a tad bit disappointed about that.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: NanaNow
review: Weak is not the word for this. There is a slight smell but what I don‚Äôt know. Let‚Äôs call it semi sweet. I at first thought something was wrong with my nose so I decided on a little experiment. Since I am home all day, I lit the candle in my living room and let it burn the full 8 hours that my son was out of the house. Only the second time with this candle. When he returned I asked if he like the candle scent. HE COULD BARELY SMELL IT AFTER AN 8 HOUR BURN WALKING FROM OUTSIDE DIRECTLY INTO THE ROOM. Need I say more??

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: JOHN
review: I thought I'd take a chance on this scent/candle after getting a GQ box candle that was wonderful but prohibitively expensive and....ugh.  It smells like the industry-mandated MEN's "fragrance" that apparently MUST be added to any product marketed to males.  It smells like (Insert ANY basic men's shaving gel).  NOT worth it and I would recommend avoiding.  Anyway...candle scents SHOULD be neutral, I feel.  Nature-based scent categories and not even venture into "clean linen" or goofy things like that.  HARD PASS.

That was my first mistake. Everyone knows most Yankee candles punch you in the nose when you smell them for the first time. My candle has been lit for about two hours now, and I smell absolutely nothing. I‚Äôm disappointed, to say the least. I know this isn‚Äôt something you should expect from Yankee candle, because I‚Äôve had this before and it was AMAZING. My house smelled so good! But this one I just ordered? Major let down. That‚Äôll teach me from ordering them off Amazon vs going to the store and getting it directly. I wish I could return it, honestly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Deborah
review: I love my yankee candle. I have sinus problems so finding a candle I can smell is difficult. I lift the lids in the stores & if I can‚Äôt smell it I won‚Äôt buy it. Yankee candles have always had a great scent. I had a woman come over once when I had the lid off the jar as she came up my stairs she said ‚ÄúThank Heaven , Scented candles‚Äù The previous place she went smelled like cats and dogs. I knew that person and she always has a very clean house. I had a cat myself but she couldn‚Äôt smell any cat smells. I keep a clean litter box because I cannot live with the smell. It gets cleaned after every use and taken outside to the trash . The other lady taught me that so I know her litter was clean. The candles make a huge difference.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Bargnhtress
review: Horrible!!!  I have been buying a lot of Yankee Candles from Amazon lately because of the deals they have been having.  I bought over a dozen in the last month here but have been buying them for over 30 years.  This one just about made me gag!  It smells like rotten burnt coconut shells!  Gross!!!  I gave it a good try but will be returning it.  I love most of the others but this one is like burning rotten garbage in the back of a smoothie shop!  It smells like they let tropical fruit rot and then juiced them and added it to the wax.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: JPB
review: I have this candle on scheduled regular delivery.  The last batch had very minimal fragrance.  No, it has nothing to do with sense of smell being affected by covid.  I bought a different brand scented candle from the store in place of this purchase. It's scented and the aroma was just perfect.  I can smell it and it emitted a wonderful scent. I had several people try smelling the Yankee candle.  Each and everyone said there was hardly any aroma.  Please stop making excuses.  Someone.dropped the ball and covid was just an easy excuse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses
author: Serpico16
review: As stated, the wife got me hooked on fragrant candles.  Lived half of my life without an opinion either way, don't know how I ever managed. Must admit, this Lilac Blossom scent is simply excellent.  A definite favorite of ours. Yankee Candle (JAR TYPE) are a favorite of ours.  Price is right too. We like aromatic candles that last.  Some are very expensive and yet, I have to put my beak practically into the flame in order to recognize a hint of an aroma.  Big League Taboo for this 52 yr old kids beak, as I blister easily not to mention the discolored tip which is generally black or in a shade thereof. Not to mention it simply does nothing for my looks. But not with these Large Jar Yankee Candles with so much aroma. My beak is safe at last. Thank you Yankee Candle.  My beak thanks you too.  ;)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Fresh Cut Roses

They will "contact" me in 24hrs by email regarding this issue. No questions about the item and truly no assistance at all. Yankee candles have a strong scent and this thing has none. Only the bottle with the name stating is a real Yankee candle which is definitely not!!!!! Scammer whoever sells this crap!!!

You really can‚Äôt go wrong with Yankee candle‚Äôs. Such good quality and such amazing customer service. I highly recommend them.

review: I usually buy the standard vanilla but my husband ordered the vanilla cupcake.  I came home one day and thought for sure he was baking something good to eat.  To my disappointment, it was just the candle.  But wow, the Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Vanilla Cupcake has a great scent and might be my new favorite. And of course, its hard to beat the longevity that you get out of the Yankee candle compared to the store candles.  They are definitely worth the extra money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: ChristiGrace
review: One of our all time favorite Yankee scents. Warm cozy Vanilla scent with good throw. I highly recommend this candle as well as the use of a Yankee Candle Illuma ring lid with these candles it helps them burn so much cleaner and using every drop let's you enjoy it that much longer! The Illuma lids are both pretty and functional, and can be purchased very reasonably during Yankees clearance sales. Enjoy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Marcia
review: One of my candles were defective.  It was melted and the top seal was cracked.  I have never had this issue before and I have bought numerous Yankee candles from Amazon.  The other candle I bought with the same order was fine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Kindle Customer

This is a such a welcoming and cozy scent for me. My entire house smells like cool crisp fall air and leaves . I like to purchase from Amazon and not have to travel to the store which is about an hour away. Delivery is always fast and price is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

review: This is supposed to be review of the products but I would like to point out how impressive the packaging was. I live in overseas military address and I had a bad luck ordering glass container products. However, these are packaged from the factory. Order 6 jars and received within two weeks in a great condition. Well packaged but lots of cardboard trashes ( can‚Äôt complain, it got here safe!!) I am very happy with the products!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco
author: Terry Cee
review: I used to absolutely love Yankee candles. But I've found that my recent purchases of their candles were very disappointing. "Christmas Cookie" was my favorite! I would get 10 of them every December.  But now every one  of them that I have purchased have no scent! What happened? I will stick with my favorite Homeworx candles  and the few Bath and Body candles ( Pumpkin Apple is my favorite. Very strong throw) for now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

It lasted about 6 days burning nonstop (probably would have lasted about 2 weeks if we ever blew it out each night). Will be buying these from now on.

I won‚Äôt purchase on here again, I‚Äôll just look for them in the stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Caf√© Al Fresco

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: LS
review: Really disappointed with us Mel. I am a lemon free, I like the freshness and zest of lemon. I tried it for after the New Year to get rid of all the Christmas smells, and I actually had the blow it out. I am not one of those fuzzy people who complains, I love candles oh, but this one was actually sickening. I kept trying to decide what it smelled like, and it smell like a gas station bathroom with one of those air fresheners. No I didn't return it, I don't believe in just returning things because you're unhappy with a smell, but I am disappointed with Yankee Candle for that. I wish descriptions were more realistic and believable. You can't know a smell until you buy the stupid thing, and that's twenty bucks down the drain

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Sunny417

author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

author: Ranger

The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar

product_title: Yankee Candle Sicillian Lemon Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Jeana Lee Paccasassi
review: No scent! What a waste of $30 bucks! I‚Äôm sending back or asking for a credit.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: MilsNY
review: I bought this for the first time shortly before Christmas 2021 and lit it for several hours almost every day. The scent is very strong, and it smells like real so yummy - a delicious combination of lavender and lemon. I've been looking for a scent with lavender essential oils for a while, because of the great benefits in relaxing the spirit. Combining lavender with lemon is perfect for me, as it relaxes me but also uplifts me, and so I used this during the day, and absolutely LOVE it. I extinguish the flame by putting back the lid, so the smoke stays inside the container. I noticed that the smell lasts long even after I had extinguished it, and even the days I don't lit it and the container is closed I can still smell the scent. Super high quality and lovely. Highly recommended. NOTE - I have never tested CVD  positive in the two years here in NYC, and never lost my sense of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: P. Thompson
review: First of all, Yankee Candles are one of the best that I've found and one of my go to candle companies.  Even unlit, the scent is pleasantly alive, though not as strong as when lit. For this particular scent, I was looking for a lavender scented candle specifically to burn in the evening to relax me before going to bed.  While this one isn't entirely lavender, the combination is almost mouthwatering.  Must be the addition of the lemon.  Lemon, or any citrus, is a fond favorite of mine as well. It's been a while since I've been able to burn candles and I'm so glad I can still get my favorites from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: MilsNY
review: I bought this for the first time shortly before Christmas 2021 and lit it for several hours almost every day. The scent is very strong, and it smells like real so yummy - a delicious combination of lavender and lemon. I've been looking for a scent with lavender essential oils for a while, because of the great benefits in relaxing the spirit. Combining lavender with lemon is perfect for me, as it relaxes me but also uplifts me, and so I used this during the day, and absolutely LOVE it. I extinguish the flame by putting back the lid, so the smoke stays inside the container. I noticed that the smell lasts long even after I had extinguished it, and even the days I don't lit it and the container is closed I can still smell the scent. Super high quality and lovely. Highly recommended. NOTE - I have never tested CVD  positive in the two years here in NYC, and never lost my sense of smell.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: P. Thompson
review: First of all, Yankee Candles are one of the best that I've found and one of my go to candle companies.  Even unlit, the scent is pleasantly alive, though not as strong as when lit. For this particular scent, I was looking for a lavender scented candle specifically to burn in the evening to relax me before going to bed.  While this one isn't entirely lavender, the combination is almost mouthwatering.  Must be the addition of the lemon.  Lemon, or any citrus, is a fond favorite of mine as well. It's been a while since I've been able to burn candles and I'm so glad I can still get my favorites from Yankee.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Steven B. Nichols
review: Bought as a Christmas gift for my sister-in-law and she was happy and enjoyed the scent. I didn't realize that my brother doesn't like the scent of lavender and this seemed to be a minor issue as she doesn't want to burn it at her office because of a co-worker that complains about everything... but other than that it was a hit!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: rjc311
review: I love Walmart‚Äôs Lavendar Lemonade candles and waxes so I decided to see if Yankee had a similar scent.  I was happy to see they did and ordered it right away.  Here I am burning it and finally had to extinguish it because it literally smells like a urinal cake to me.  The lemon smells so synthetic I can hardly believe it.  Oh well, back to the Walmart ones I go!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Shara
review: Just opened for holidays. Glad I didn‚Äôt gift because unless the room is 2x2 one isn‚Äôt going to smell much. The other scent I purchased won‚Äôt even left me review it! And no, it is not a result If covid.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Michelle K
review: I love the scent of this candle!!! It is not overwhelming. I always buy Yankee Candles because they do last and don't loose their scent. A perfect gift for anyone who loves the scent of lavender.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Elizabeth Thomas
review: I am a fan of Goose Creek, bought these on impulse.  YC has much less scent than GC. Close up, the very light scent is very nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: J Hudson
review: I would like to write a good review, cause the box smells really good, but it arrived broken.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Javier herrera
review: Good smell lasts long and does not cause headaches very light yet noticeable scentüòä

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: LADYDYEANN
review: I love these candle spell very good they are Awesome

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: John Garcia
review: Received as advertised and as scheduled

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Laurel
review: Great scented candle. Love their candles.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: Best quality candle i ever bought well worth the money lasts a long time

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Pamela Lopez
review: Always buy Yankee candles

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: K Q
review: I‚Äôve shopping yankee candles before and it‚Äôs nice.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Stephanie
review: I visited my sister and she had this candle. Hers had a beautiful scent. I order this but is not the same scent. Actually it doesn‚Äôt smell at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Yolanda Fay Roberson
review: The best.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Blessed
review: Smells great but not overwhelming.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: JB
review: The best smelling candle

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Laura O
review: Yankee candles are not good anymore

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: Candle had layer on it side and melted. Making it useless.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: I love the smell. It was purchased to give as a Christmas gift to my AP. Can it be replaced?

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Angie
review: Did not burn good and had a chemical smell!

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Cody Power
review: Candle arrived completely melted and unusable.

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Amazon Customer
review: I don‚Äôt have Covid, it just does not have a sent that last

product_title: Yankee Candle 1073481EZ Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
author: Jana
review: Smells great but not as strong as I'd like.

product_title: Yankee Candle Cherries on Snow Scented Premium Paraffin Grade Candle Wax with up to 150 Hour Burn Time, Large Jar
author: Martha M Hapgood
review: I ordered this candle as a surprise gift for a friend of mine and expected it to arrive in a separate box with a gift message on the invoice so that my friend knew it was from me. Sadly, my friend never knew the candle came from me as it was boxed with other candles that she had ordered that week!!! She thought it was a fluke! How does that happen! As far as the Cherries on Snow candle goes, my friend absolutely loved the scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Alondra
review: Not as fragrant as I would like, but still a nice scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: Alondra
review: Not as fragrant as I would like, but still a nice scent.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Passionflower Scented Candle, Large 2-Wick, 80 Hour Burn Time
author: JPH
review: This is my first, and probably my last, Yankee Candle. Takes a while to get going and would probably have been more effective as a 3-wick rather than 2-wick candle.  Scent throw is very good, subtle but pervasive over a wide area and remains in the air for a while after the candle is extinguished/covered.  The scent is very floral, pleasant, but I don't pick up the advertised lime/jasmine tea. As one reviewer has noted, after the candle burns down a bit, it really does look like a brain.  There are channels throughout the candle, making it look like the amygdala.  Perhaps a cost-cutting measure, candle burns using less wax. This candle was a nice one-off, nothing about the candle that would compel me to purchase it again.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Cherries on Snow Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Zachary C. Hoskins
review: I almost hesitate to write a review, I ordered something that seemed interesting and new, and instead I got something just fine. The candle I received was 'Wild Cherry'. So while all of Yankee Candles are great and the packaging and so forth was great. I am frustrated because I would not have ordered a 'Wild Cherry' scented candle. It's not worth the trouble to return and after all it is a yankee candle. Just beware you may not get what you ordered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Cherries on Snow Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Zachary C. Hoskins
review: I almost hesitate to write a review, I ordered something that seemed interesting and new, and instead I got something just fine. The candle I received was 'Wild Cherry'. So while all of Yankee Candles are great and the packaging and so forth was great. I am frustrated because I would not have ordered a 'Wild Cherry' scented candle. It's not worth the trouble to return and after all it is a yankee candle. Just beware you may not get what you ordered.

product_title: Yankee Candle Elevation Collection with Platform Lid Sweet Frosting Scented Candle, Small 1-Wick, 28 Hour Burn Time
author: McKinley Brown
review: I wouldn't recommend this product. It is a very small candle and doesn't have all that impressive of a scent

product_title: Yankee Candle Christmas Cookie Scenterpiece Easy MeltCup, Festive Scent
author: William
review: Paid Mom and Baby for 2 candles but only received 1.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Michele F
review: I have been buying Yankee Candles for years. My favorite is Macintosh apple. When I saw this scent, I decided to try it. Initially the scent was wonderful, my whole place smelled like someone was baking with cinnamon. I thought I had found a new favorite. Fast forward a couple of weeks. Once the candle had burned down about an inch, all of the scent disappeared. I am so disappointed. I have practically a whole candle that has no aroma. I've never experienced this with a Yankee Candle before, however I've read many reviews from people who have experienced a similar issue with other scents. If you're looking for a long lasting candle with a nice scent, steer clear of sugared cinnamon apple.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Gina G-Lover
review: The first one I ordered arrived semi melted. See my photos. You‚Äôll see one where it actually leaked thru the cardboard it was packed in & thru that to the box it was mailed in. I returned it & got a replacement. The second one arrived semi melted too but not as bad as the first one. See photos. The top of the candle wasn‚Äôt flat & it got wax inside the cover & like stained it. I couldn‚Äôt wipe it clean. The second one wasn‚Äôt that bad so I kept it & it‚Äôs actually almost all gone because I‚Äôve been burning it. I was a big fan of Yankee candles because you could always smell the scent through out your house but I didn‚Äôt find that with this one? Not sure why?? Funny thing is I ordered this I believe in November/December & it‚Äôs not hot enough for the wax to be melting inside the candle during the shipping process. I don‚Äôt think I will buy anymore Yankee candles‚Ä¶besides the other ones I bought through here & had issues with too.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Joe E.
review: I have purchased many different brands of candles over the years trying to find a company that competes in its fragrances with Yankee candles. I finally decided several years ago that I would only buy Yankee candles and stop wasting my money on the other brands, since I am always disappointed with them. I was thrilled when I found my favorite Cranberry Chutney jar candle available on Amazon a couple of weeks before Christmas. However, as I have burned it over the past several days, I have been extremely disappointed. My house used to be filled with the delicious aroma from this candle, but this time, I can barely smell it. I have heard the excuse that people are complaining about Yankee candles' scents this year due to a loss of smell from Covid-19. That is not the case with me, because I have not contracted covid, and my sense of smell is just fine. If other people are complaining, I have a feeling the Yankee Candle Company has changed something in the way it adds the different fragrances to their candles, so now, they are less potent than they always have been. I want a candle that can fill my house with a delicious scent, not one that I have to keep trying to smell! If you are expecting the Yankee Candle of old when you purchase this one, you will be disappointed. Please, Yankee Candle Company, go back to your former formulas for your candles!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ann McD
review: You cannot beat the price of an authentic Yankee Candle. I live in MA and it‚Äôs hard to find any on sale Amazon had the best selection. I buy them all the time for gifts. They‚Äôre packaged exactly how the company would ship them. I‚Äôve had bathe and body works candles show up broken and glass everywhere. Not these! This candle has incredible throw of scent and it lasts forever! For $19 I‚Äôm blown away. It‚Äôs like getting 4 regular candles in one. No comparison. Highest quality and timeless scent is worth the price. Thanks Amazon for letting me keep one lit every day! Makes my house homey! Perfect gifts- I recommend the sage and citrus, lilac as well. Not pink sands‚Ä¶ avoid that one!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Chase
review: Arrived completely defective. It was visually leaking outside the packaging and this was clearly on Yankee Candle's end because the rest of my products inside the same Amazon box were all completely fine. Absolutely unacceptable. I usually buy from Village Candle instead, and believe me, you should too. I have had issue with every Yankee Candle I've purchased before and never a problem with their #1 competition...I'll let you draw your own conclusions on which company to buy from!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: DrM
review: I purchased this from Amazon and did not use it right away. When I went to use it, the wick was not useable so I could not burn the candle. I called Yankee Candle since it was outside Amazon's return window and they refused to replace it, kept referring me back to Amazon--even though it was not Amazon's fault they made a defective product. Very disappointed in Yankee Candle customer service.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Dan B.
review: The product is fantastic! The problem is Bezos taking his cut which don't leave much meat on the bone for the seller, and I think that's BULLSHlT!! I sincerely hope, from the bottom of my heart that Jeff and the Sanchez live forever! Again, fantastic product! Great seller! Thank you very much.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kindle Customer
review: The candle smells nice but is no where near as nice as a real Yankee candle.  I think these are counterfeit - someone kept the jar and refilled it with a candle but it just is not as strong nor pleasant as a real Yankee candle.  I am disappointed.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amanda Zufall
review: These don't break the bank and they have a very nice scent. The only thing I noticed is that it takes awhile for the scent to fill a room. They aren't very very potent. (now keep in mind this is more a matter of personal preference than an actual complaint. I prefer really heavily scented candles.) Overall though, these do fill the room after awhile and they provide a lovely ambiance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Scott Lamb
review: Everyone out there in Amazon Land take heed. Yankee Candles are not worth the money, you‚Äôre basically paying for the name. I bought 3 candles, had them lit for well over an hour and could barely pick up any scent other then the burning wicks. Granted some scents maybe stronger then others, but I‚Äôm not willing to take that chance. Will not purchase Yankee Candles again!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Todd
review: I'm a fan of Yankee Candle and have even visited their facility/headquarters. I've never purchased a candle from them and been disappointed . . . until this candle.  I ordered this and also a Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup, for the Fall season.  We can barely smell anything from the Yankee Spiced Pumpkin.  For a similar seasonal scent, I'd recommend the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup. Great scent. Yankee needs to go back to the drawing board on the Spiced Pumpkin.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mimi
review: I am very disappointed in this Yankee candle. I have been buying authentic Yankee Candles for more than 20 years. This my first Yankee Candle purchase on Amazon. In the past, I have always purchased from Hallmark Stores or Bed, Bath & Beyond, and never suffered a low quality Yankee Candle. This candle from Amazon vendor has a very weak scent. Past purchases had scents so strong the fragrance required burning a short 10 minutes only.  I have burned this fake candle almost 2 hours to only get a faint Autumn Harvest scent by sniffing near the jar. Having bought a same scent Yankee Candle from a reputable, authorized dealer, I am astounded at the difference being night & day. This is a knock-off Yankee Candle and my last purchase of such on Amazon. I would not recommend any fragrance offered of this cheaper version. You get what you pay for‚Ä¶buyer beware! Burned but not by the candle wick.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: 1956netta
review: I purchased this Candle in November, & saved this particular candle to light closer to the week of Christmas. The scent whatever it is did not work for me. There is hardly a scent, & smells nothing like Apple Cinnamon. The way it burns, & aside of the wax looking really weird, I‚Äôm inclined to believe this is not an Authentic ‚ÄúYankee Candle!‚Äù Will be returning!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Joe Morrow
review: Love the scent of this particular candle. Seasonal and warm. My kids love it, too. These candles last forever - dozens of hours of burn time. Do need to use a wick cutter, but that's basic candle care. When these go on sale, I love to give them away as holiday gifts because there is such a variety that they are customizable in terms of who I give them to.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nora M .
review: This is the first Yankee Candle that I didn't care for . The scent was not as I expected at all. The scent was more like a rancid and old smell . Was not giftable at all , the top of the wax was bubbly and discolored.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Dennis Husejnovic
review: I don't know if what I got was fake but I was never this disappointed by a Yankee candle. The pumpkin spice candle smelled like burning wax, no scent at all. I wonder if I was sent a fake... Never spending the money on them again, now they are expensive for no reason.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ben
review: The media could not be loaded. I bought this candle for about $20. It was bought using a gift card & I had no idea if it was worth it, but I wanted a candle & this scent caught my attention, and I am not dissapointed. I've had the candle lit for 12+ hours and it hardly made a dent in the wax. I've used it everyday since I recieved it 3 days ago. The scent takes just a little while to set in, but it will fill a room unlike some soy blends. I am almost certain that this candle will last me until March/April. And when that time comes, I WILL buy another. I recorded a video to show the small dent it has made. (Ignore the WAP in the back)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Brooke1982
review: I worry about buying candles online because sometimes they come melted, cracked, or older with no scent. This candle smells like it should and is in gift giving condition.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Lisa D. Sample-Page
review: I‚Äôve always loved Yankee Candles,  I especially love the ‚Äúautumn‚Äù aromas.  This candle definitely delivered, great aroma, last forever, would make a great gift

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: kathy b.
review: I always buy yankee candles but I think this is the last time I have bought 3 in the last 2 or 3 months and I do not get that high smell like I got in the past years.  I don't know what you have done but the candels are not the same the smells are VERY VERY FAINT  I AM UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER AS OF NOW

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mike Graff
review: Smell is good, but it is the name you're paying for. Plenty of less expensive candles that last as long and smell as strong and good for about half the price. Burnt the candle about 1/3 of the way and the way it was made,, the wick was too close to the glass and it cracked from the heat.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jaclyn Hensley
review: It was major savings and a risk (scent). Hope it smells better while burning. Apple is great, but the pumpkin or combining it has that indescribable unnatural tinge I dont like.  Packaged was impressive! Always worry about glass! Egg carton around the candle and fit snuggled in Yankee candle box, shipped in another box.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Marta
review: Read all the raving reviews and had to get it now for the holidays. My family walked in Thanksgiving and immediately mentioned how wonderful my home smelled and they weren't talking about the turkey. Fills your home with this cozy, warm smell. I'm glad I got 2 of them.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: CarrieJo-83
review: While I will admit the scent of the candle is WONDERFUL! The whole candle is garbage. I ordered this on 12/27. This is how it arrived. Melted and not usable. I contacted Amazon.com who said I had to contact Yankee Candle and I did. No response. No refund. No replacement. So this $20 candle is garbage. Pretty disappointed. Especially in the Yankee Candle brand who claims they pride themselves on customer satisfaction. Buyer beware! If it arrives damaged, you‚Äôre stuck with it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Ann Marie Thompson
review: I have been looking for a nice fall scent and this was perfect. I burn a lot of candles. I am very pleased with yankee candles. They have gone up in price that was a bit of a surprise. But I guess like everything else. You can‚Äôt go wrong with this brand of candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: A. Mitchell
review: This was my first time getting this scent. Instead of 'sight unseen' this was a case of 'scent un-smelled'. I relied solely on reviews and I'm glad I did - this smelled great! This scent created the ambiance I was looking for and I would gladly recommend it!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Cynthia
review: Never had an issue with Yankee Candle before so I'm very disappointed. No scent. Can only smell it in Jar or if you're immediately next to it and even then it's very, very faint. definitely doesn't fill the air. Thinking the candle wasn't pored / manufactured correctly- I've let it burn to 1/3 of the jar- still nothing. Waste of money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Susulynne
review: I‚Äôm not sure about this scent and if it will smell. The scented oil from candle leaked in jar, lid and outside of the jar. Not sure what happened or if candle was stored too long. I did light it and it does smell, but, I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs pumpkin spice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: X
review: I was a bit skeptical to buy another candle from Amazon. The previous candle I purchased from Amazon was melted to one side of the jar (I was able to melt the wax and reset the wick). And I've read the reviews about similar melted candle problems, and people complaining about no scent. But I'm very happy with this purchase. This candle arrived in perfect condition and has plenty of scent. Exactly what I expected it to be.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: G.K. Ray
review: I have been a loyal customer of Yankee Candle for years. I love their products; the scents are always perfectly concentrated for me to enjoy the holiday season especially. I appreciate their willingness to replace my deliveries twice. However, I will NO LONGER buy their candles online. As wondrous as their products are, their package team leaves much to be desired. Every order and complimentary replacement arrived broken. Package glass better, please! Thank you for the replacements, but get it together.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mellowjade
review: I got 2 of these but I have to say - they really lack in scent. Not sure if I got an old batch or what but they weren't what I expected. I find that some Yankee candles just lack in general so that could be the case with this particular scent. Won't purchase again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: I bought Autumn Wreath so that my living room could be infused with a holiday scent.  The candle is basically a red candle in a jar with zero scent.  It has a slight scent when you get your nose right up to it--but then you risk burning it off.  I really regret this purchase --stay away.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Christina Vasquez
review: Disappointed this candle arrived damaged and melted. I was planning to give this as a gift but will need to return it. Next time, I‚Äôll take the time to go into the Yankee store or order online. I‚Äôve never had issues when ordering directly from Yankee but was trying to avoid having to go to the mall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jeff
review: I love the scent of this candle because it smells like Christmas.  I actually used a candle warmer to melt it.  I use it in the months of Oct-Jan. I even had a co-worker to step in and say it smells like Christmas because she could smell it in the hallway...she loved it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: A reader
review: This scent is warm and welcoming and works for both fall and the holidays. I like the Yankee Candles because the scents seem to be high quality and I'm often over-sensitive to perfumes. They also last a long, long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Susan B. Southwell
review: The price was great and I love the scent. Arrived the next day!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: ELM
review: Overall, I really like the candles from Yankee Candle. This candle has a really good blend of both apple, and pumpkin spice scents. I would 100% buy these again for burning at home during the fall & Holiday seasons.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Cory
review: Yep, it was probably from leftover stock, but it was perfectly fine. Smells like Caramel Apple, had a nice wafting aroma Well-boxed, no problems with shipping I would recommend

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amber
review: The candle scent is amazing, however it isn't really giftable due to the packaging. Wherever it came from must have been warm, because the wax has bled into the lid. So it doesn't have an attractive appearance.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: L. Amundsen
review: I love Yankee Candles, and I like Midsummer's Night, but I ordered Cranberry Chutney. I'm not dealing with the hassle of a return during Christmas, so I'm glad I at least like the scent I  got.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kate Cullen
review: Candle wax was melted and slid as it resolidified  so it covers most the wick. The lid didn't seal good because its lined with melted wax. It fell off as I was moving the candle and it shattered! The wax is all bubbly. Not sure if i will be able to salvage this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Mark
review: This is the third time buying this candle. I bought two last year and gifted one of them. This year, it was gifted as a birthday present. This scent couldn‚Äôt describe fall any better!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: L. Kulczycki
review: Love Yankee Candles!  Lasts a long time!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Sally D.
review: I ordered 2 Cranberry Chutney large jar candles, the boxes were labeled on the outside with Cranberry Chutney but when I opened them they were both Midsummer's Night.  I don't know if I like them, not sure I want 4 of them if I try to order again

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: AL
review: candle came undamaged, burned it for about 3 hours and it filled half the house with great cinnamon and apples smell. burns slower and has stronger scent than box store candles. Am saving it to burn Thanksgiving thru Christmas to fill house with a holiday scent.  very pleased and worth the 18.88 price

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Wevsbell
review: Scent is really nice, one of the things I look forward to in the fall.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Lisa
review: this came with some liquified oily residue that had seeped thru the inner packing, and was all over my hands when I took it out. I burned it for 4 hours and no smell AT ALL even standing over it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Alison
review: I was nervous to buy this after seeing some reviews stating it was knock off. But my candle came in the jar as pictured, and has a great scent. I think it‚Äôs great for fall and wintertime !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kelly T
review: I remember when a Yankee candle could fill a room with fragrance.  Not this particular candle.  I smell the smoke more when I blow it out than when I burn the candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Amazon Customer
review: Delivery driver was great.  He noticed some wax that leaked out of my box and suggested I open it immediately in case it the jar was cracked.  It wasn't,  the candle was packed upside down and Florida heat made the candle st as it to leak out from poorly placed lid. I was thinking about ordering more prior to this delivery as presents , but not after this experience. I didn't return it because it was still functional but just not pretty.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Nani
review: These are by far the best fragrant Candle out there I buy them every year and use them daily They make a great gift and your house smells amazing Great Great Great Love them

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: strawberry23d
review: I had this candle burning since about 6am. It's now about noon and I get a very faint smell of cranberry. This was a good price but I'm not sure I'm going to keep it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jacklyn and Eduardo
review: Not sure why it don't smell st all when lit but sure has a lot of black smoke coming from it.my other on is perfect not sure why this one's not smelling.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Tyler
review: I‚Äôve been buying yankee candles for years! This has absolutely no scent whatsoever!!! Very disappointed!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: H Steiner
review: I‚Äôve always liked Yankee candles because they lasted long and they always had a very nice scent.  Now sure what has happened to Yankee but this will be my last purchase of this brand.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Kat
review: This is a Wonderful candle! Long lasting. and smells so much like autumn. It fill's my home with forever scent. Yes, Recommend this Candle 100 percent. AAA+++

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath

review: I love the smell.  The product was well packed and it arrived on a timely manner even tho it was shipped to a military base. Thank you so much!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath

review: It arrived melted but we‚Äôre able to use it. I should have known better than ordering a candle to me delivered in Arizona.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath

review: I love the smell but it‚Äôs not enough to fill a room with an aroma, which I love and why I buy candles.

Glad I didn‚Äôt purchase it as a gift for someone. Something must have happened to it in transit or it was poorly stored at the warehouse.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jax Naydol
review: The sun is a very nice fall sent but it doesn't smell up the living room it could probably smell up a bathroom but it's not as strong as they used to be. I've been searching for a strong scented candle and I just can't seem to find one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Jan Bolding
review: This was not in good condition when I got it.  It was a gift for my daughter and she told me it broke easily after she got it out.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath

review: Yankee candles are quite a bit more expensive than other generic ones that looks the same.  But the scent is much nicer.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Starlena Profitt
review: Love the way this candle smelled. It didn't seem to last as long as other Yankee Candles I've gotten but it smelled great!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Autumn Wreath
author: Faye
review: I am not usually a fan of Yankee Candles, but I was purchased by so many reviews. When I opened the package, I noticed the scent was mild, and when lit, the candle didn‚Äôt put out any scent at all! And of course, it isn‚Äôt returnable!! Do not waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Mistletoe
author: L. H.
review: I see other customers have received the same misshapen candle.  This was shipped with two other Yankee candles (different seller), in the same box, that were fine, which tells me that it was indeed shipped like this.  This has happened enough, that some quality control needs to be implemented. I love the smell of this candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Mistletoe
author: CRD
review: Like many other reviews I can attest this candle really has hardly any scent. Glad I bought it at a discount otherwise I would return it. Burn life is great but what does that matter if there‚Äôs no scent. For perspective, I bought some pine scented hand soap and you can smell that in the apartment when someone washes but not this candle. Would not recommend.

review: Love these candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Mistletoe

review: Jar was broken. Won‚Äôt let me return item

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Mistletoe
author: pakaz
review: Wax burned evenly but very quickly; not as fragrant as I had hoped.  But what I could smell was very pleasant.  Candle a really beautiful color of green.  Be careful when and how you extinguish -- a lot of smoke that wouldn't dissipate.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle, Mistletoe
author: Am. Cust.
review: We ordered three sets of Yankee Candle Mistletoe scent the green candle and three times we received the red cinnamon candles. So thing happened to the quality assurance because the cinnamon is in the mistletoe box three times!! What an inconvenience!! I sent them back the candles are of great quality but we wanted Mistletoe!  Hope we get a full refund!! Thanks in advance!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: LS
review: Really disappointed with us Mel. I am a lemon free, I like the freshness and zest of lemon. I tried it for after the New Year to get rid of all the Christmas smells, and I actually had the blow it out. I am not one of those fuzzy people who complains, I love candles oh, but this one was actually sickening. I kept trying to decide what it smelled like, and it smell like a gas station bathroom with one of those air fresheners. No I didn't return it, I don't believe in just returning things because you're unhappy with a smell, but I am disappointed with Yankee Candle for that. I wish descriptions were more realistic and believable. You can't know a smell until you buy the stupid thing, and that's twenty bucks down the drain

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Sunny417
review: This was a blind purchase and I'm glad I took the chance. I was worried it was going to smell like furniture polish, but it is a lovely fruity lemon scent almost like kids cereal. Very pleased!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Joe Morrow
review: Yankee candles are great. They last for a very long time (I would estimate around 100 hours) and there is lots of variety. Lemon is my favorite for everyday use, and this scent is my favorite lemon of all time. It's a little sweet, but not sickening sweet, and it's not the tangy lemon smell of kitchen soap or cleaner. It's perfect.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: CheeryToes
review: I was really expecting this candle to have more of a cilantro scent, the idea of the candle is great, the reality is a heavily pineapple scented candle that makes me rather nauseous. I waited a year or two for the price to drop on this when it did I snapped it up - what a disappointment - I cannot recommend this scent. blech

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Ranger
review: Have enjoyed these candles for many years. It was a nice surprise to see some of the scents here on Amazon for far less than retail at their stores. Of course, not all inventory was available but I found three that I like. Highly recommend purchasing these Yankee Candles on Amazon.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: paulinespens
review: This smell of this candle is horrific. It isn't no where near a fruity, Happy smell. I lit the candle soon as I got it. I was so excited. Lemon is one of my favorite smells. It burned for a few hours as I did my own thing around the house. I realized I hasn't smelled lemon yet so I went to check the candle. Whatever you used for this candle please never use it again. The smell is like burnt hair. That's the best way to describe it. I won't even give this away. Worst candle ever.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: K. M. Benjamin
review: I can smell this wonderful apple scent ! Which I believe means I don‚Äôt have COVID . Who knew that candles could be so important in the fight against it. Of course the shipping was super fast and the product was careful bundled to make it to me !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: A. Hassan
review: I am very sensitive to air fresheners and scented things, in general-- including most YC scents. This one smells clean and light and does not make me wheeze. The lid fits tightly enough to keep in all the "post candle extinguishing smoke of death".

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: ernest g ruiz
review: I bought this candle a while back ( not from amazon ) , beautiful aroma.I ordered the same candle form Amazon, and as you can see in photos it's damaged.The Amazon customer service is excellent and they are sending me a replacement.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: Christine
review: I normally buy this candle directly from Yankee candle but I wanted it sooner so I ordered it on Amazon because of the price I was totally disappointed that this candle did not even fill my living room with the scent would definitely  not by again

author: Michael Kopecky
review: This product comes badly packaged off Amazon shipping and will easily break like mine did the second you open it.  It also smells absolutely disgusting, worse than any artificial lemon scent I‚Äôve ever smelled!  What a waste of my money!

review: I love this sweet citrusy smell. I know it's meant for summer, but I like to burn it with the windows open on a cool day. It's a nice scent to air out the room, especially on cleaning days, when it covers cleaning sprays' scents subtly.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Strawberry Lemon Ice
author: mady b.
review: I ran out of a candle with this particular scent and was glad to find it on amazon for such a great deal. I‚Äôve already been burning it for hours and it still smells as amazing as it did at first and barely any wax has melted so I know this will last a long amount of time

author: Aimee
review: I cannot burn this candle more than 5 minutes or I will have an allergy attack because the fragrance is too overpowering. I live in an average sized house. Used in a large room.
