product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Susan
review: I was never really a "candle person" until my next door neighbor's cigarette smoke started to waif over to our side of our townhouse.  Enter Yankee Candle... One of my favorite flavors and aromas is vanilla, so of course I ordered two Vanilla Cupcake candles to not only enjoy but to try and combat the lovely flavor with the pungent odor of cigarette smoke.  It worked so I keep them burning all day, up until I go to bed for the night.  Yankee Candle is one of a kind and burns just right.  Don't get fooled with imposter candles, which I won't mention their names out here.... Just stay with Yankee and you won't go wrong!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ELM
review: I don't know if I got a defective one or not, but it doesn't smell at all. I gave it two stars instead of one, though, because it does have excellent longevity. I'll probably put it in our emergency kit stash, as it's going to last a long time.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Molly S.
review: I have ordered many Yankee Candles from Amazon. The first thing I do when I get one is open the lid and take a big whiff. I'm always happy until this time. The only smell I got was unscented wax. Very disappointing. I like to light a candle at night and this one was listed at a good price, plus I've used this fragrance many, many times before. I know exactly what it smells like. The jar I got was nothing but unscented wax. Too bad. I was really looking forward to burning it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: jspears
review: I usually buy the standard vanilla but my husband ordered the vanilla cupcake.  I came home one day and thought for sure he was baking something good to eat.  To my disappointment, it was just the candle.  But wow, the Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Vanilla Cupcake has a great scent and might be my new favorite. And of course, its hard to beat the longevity that you get out of the Yankee candle compared to the store candles.  They are definitely worth the extra money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: ChristiGrace
review: One of our all time favorite Yankee scents. Warm cozy Vanilla scent with good throw. I highly recommend this candle as well as the use of a Yankee Candle Illuma ring lid with these candles it helps them burn so much cleaner and using every drop let's you enjoy it that much longer! The Illuma lids are both pretty and functional, and can be purchased very reasonably during Yankees clearance sales. Enjoy!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Marcia
review: One of my candles were defective.  It was melted and the top seal was cracked.  I have never had this issue before and I have bought numerous Yankee candles from Amazon.  The other candle I bought with the same order was fine.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kindle Customer
review: I have lots of favorites from Yankee candle and this one is on my list. I love balsam for Christmas and lots of others but this is my go to fall fragrance. This is a such a welcoming and cozy scent for me. My entire house smells like cool crisp fall air and leaves . I like to purchase from Amazon and not have to travel to the store which is about an hour away. Delivery is always fast and price is great.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Gee Kim
review: This is supposed to be review of the products but I would like to point out how impressive the packaging was. I live in overseas military address and I had a bad luck ordering glass container products. However, these are packaged from the factory. Order 6 jars and received within two weeks in a great condition. Well packaged but lots of cardboard trashes ( can‚Äôt complain, it got here safe!!) I am very happy with the products!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Terry Cee
review: I used to absolutely love Yankee candles. But I've found that my recent purchases of their candles were very disappointing. "Christmas Cookie" was my favorite! I would get 10 of them every December.  But now every one  of them that I have purchased have no scent! What happened? I will stick with my favorite Homeworx candles  and the few Bath and Body candles ( Pumpkin Apple is my favorite. Very strong throw) for now.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: C and K Sayi
review: For an Amazon product and the price, this candle is AMAZING. The scent isn‚Äôt over-bearing, but it‚Äôs also just enough. It perfectly filled our 3 bedroom house with one candle, within 30 mins of burning. It lasted about 6 days burning nonstop (probably would have lasted about 2 weeks if we ever blew it out each night). Will be buying these from now on.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Kadelia
review: I LOVE this scent so when i seen that Amazon had it, i thought YAY! Because it‚Äôs so hard to find in stores. But i don‚Äôt think the scent was all that strong like i remember it. When i bought them out the store i could have it lit all day and my whole house would smell wonderful. But i hardly smelled anything with these. I won‚Äôt purchase on here again, I‚Äôll just look for them in the stores.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michelle
review: Weak scent and doesn't burn evenly. These are not the same candles they once were. Yankee used to be the best and I loved them but not anymore. Disappointing purchase.  Homeworx candles are WAY better (on qvc)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Arinna
review: These are on sale for a reason. They were obviously stored upside down all summer in a hot warehouse. Now all the wax is melted into the lid. No wick to be seen. A useless paperweight. I've bought candles from Amazon dozens of times. This is the first I've seen anything like this. Disappointing & a hassle to exchange. Don't waste your money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ms. Anthropic
review: The ad for this candle promises a soft ivory colored candle scented like vanilla cupcake. The candle I received is a bright yellow and has no aroma at all. It also is rattling around in the jar leading me to believe it‚Äôs been sitting around the warehouse past its prime. Super disappointed in Amazon‚Äôs lack of quality control on this one.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: cacomp
review: I love Yankee candles because they are fragrant, last a long time and are reliable.  This one came in a package that was very good.  A cardboard cover designed for the candle a box and then in a Amazon box.  No breakage.  Ordered two from Walmart and both were broken. no extra packing.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: charT
review: I LOVE YANKEE CANDLES, BUT HATE PAYING SO MUCH. THIS CANDLE WAS THE RIGHT PRICE AND ARRIVED ON TIME, PERFECT CONDITION, AND JUST WONDERFUL. DON'T UNDERSTAND OTHERS WHO HAD PROBLEMS. EVERYTHING WENT PERFECT. PACKAGING WAS GREAT-CANDLE HAD NO BREAKS OR CRACKS. WILL ORDER MANY MORE

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lisa Brindley
review: The product Excel is great! My favorite candles are Yankee candles, because they burn all the way down and they have the best long lasting smell. I was lucky to get this candle on the glitch deal for $10 each. If you know anything about Yankee candle you know that was an awesome deal! My candles arrived and I assumed during shipping the glass jar broke on only one of them. I kept the candle instead of returning it because it was just the top of the jar.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Adam Fogel
review: The description of the scent sounded wonderful. Tangerine and vanilla should go together very well. Sadly, this candle smells like neither and whatever this scent is supposed to be is just awful. Can‚Äôt imagine burning this all the way, will probably try to give it to someone else.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Didi
review: I live overseas due to being in the military, These candles were packed very well and arrived on a timely manner.  Even tho I am thousands of miles away from home, this candle gives me a sense of being at home.  Thank you!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lulu
review: If I hadn't already boxed it up to return, I would attach a picture.  I took the top off the candle and it looked like it had melted in transit.  The wax was pushing up and there was no wick to be seen.  Boxed up and sent back the same day.  Will now buy Yankee Candles at Yankee Candle.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Art G
review: Leave it to Amazon to carry something that Walmart doesn't want to carry in their stores anymore and charges prohibitively for when ordering online... French Vanilla is the only candle scent worth buying. IMO

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: no
review: So i saw an article saying that people buying Yankee Candles from Amazon have no or very little scent. It was blamed on Covid...Well it is not covid because i can smell perfectly well and this Yankee candle has very little scent. So i tested and made sure by lighting a different candle from bath and body works. I was able to smell that candle perfectly. So for some reason the Yankee Candle reviews are correct by my nose.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Dawn Aleta Drawdy
review: Salted Caramel: Not only long lasting, but it's  decadent on the senses! üíó The other was damaged and Amazon promptly reimbursed me; Exceptionally excellent service as usual ‚ù£Ô∏è MERRY Christmas ‚òÉÔ∏èüå≤

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Duck MD
review: I love the smell of this candle. I just wish that I was able to find the wick so that I could light it. Somewhere along the line it was stored on its side and melted as you can see in the picture.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: NL
review: I have purchased this particular scent from other places, and from Yankee Candle directly. This candle is a let down. I'm having a hard time believing that it is authentic. The scent is very weak.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Isaac Pelott
review: Yankee is so good, but this makes you area warm, relaxing and just gives a chill vibe....love it. So good üëç light this and pumpkin spice or the apple cider üòçü§îüòã...so niiiice.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: PJW
review: Yankee candles are high-quality candles. The caramel scent of this candle is delicious. I find it's best to burn for 1 hour...After that, it can get a bit overpowering.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Ashley Edwards
review: This is the second time we‚Äôve gotten this scent and we love it. We‚Äôve actually almost burned through it already. Lasted a little over a month with burning every day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Smitty
review: I buy Yankee candles every year for family and friends so much so that they now count on receiving them!!! Great for hiding orders or bringing a beautiful scent to your home.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: DonBarb
review: I like Yankee candles, they usually have a great smell and it laughs but this one that I bought the vanilla cupcake smell was very light and not strong enough.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: xeric gardner
review: Yankee candles used to have an intense scent.  Other reviews mentioned that they have changed for the worst.  I will not buy the Brand again.  It‚Äôs really sad.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: AW
review: This candle smells wonderful! I love the French Vanilla scent! The scent fills the entire downstairs area. I highly recommend Yankee Candles!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Customer
review: As with all candles make sure to keep the wick cut short.  This scent is so wonderful, great fall and winter candle. Yankee candles are always a great choice

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Michelle Smith
review: I ordered my Yankee Candle Vanilla Cupcake Scent yesterday and received it today (great!) The only problem is that these candles purchased through Amazon doesn't have that exuberant smell of a Yankee Candle like it did in the 90's via the Yankee Candle store where I live. I don't normally pay much for candles but I liked this price...too bad...money wasted...I will stick with Bath & Body Works!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: L. C.
review: Too expensive for the product. See photo to see how it arrived.  An expensive candle, thrown upside down during delivery on a hot day.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: AnimeLover1116
review: The candle came perfectly fine and packaged. Smells great and always lasts me a fair while, in fact this is my second time buying it.  (I got the vanilla sent)

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Yaeli
review: This candle smells justLike caramel! The reviews saying that it has no smell are simply wrong . The room smells like caramel two minutes after lighting. I will say that if you do not like too sweet of a smell this is not for you. Very rich and sweet scent. I love it !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Cathy Brooks
review: Yankee candles are always quality and consistent. The candle smells as it is named. I use it in living room near fireplace.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: cheri
review: This is not a real Yankee Candle, it smells nothing like a real Yankee Candle and looks weird, like it‚Äôs been filled over a real candle. Awful!!!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Thompson
review: I used to love, and only buy, Yankee Candles... however, this purchase, the candles had NO scent to them at all.  Even after burning for hours, nothing.  I'm so upset, especially due to the cost we pay for these candles

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Donna V
review: I thought this Yankee candle would offer a aroma that would permeate the house. It doesn‚Äôt even smell! I will never purchase this product again! Not worth the money! I don‚Äôt mind paying for a candle as long as I can smell it. This one doesn‚Äôt! Don‚Äôt waste your time or money.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Stormy
review: No scent to the candle. My local Hallmark closed and I thought I had found my Yankee source. The candle had absolutely NO scent at all.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Paul E.
review: The CANDLE WAS RECEIVED MELTED INTO A WEIRD WAX SHAPE - WITH NO WICK !!! I PAID FOR NOTHING !

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Lynn
review: I really like the scent for this. It isn't overwhelming, but you can smell it when it is in use. Thank you for making it.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Tommy Kim
review: Classic Yankee candle. Great scent and quite a long burn time, as advertised. I see no reason to buy another candle brand

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle French Vanilla
author: Buys2much
review: The luscious scent filled the air the first evening.  I think the top part is the only area where it was infused.  After that, couldn‚Äôt even tell I had a candle burning.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: Bailey
review: The candle smells great and makes my whole living room smell good, but the smell doesn't linger and once the candle is out the scent dissipates quickly. Nice gift idea though

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar 2 Wick Sicillian Lemon Scented Tumbler Premium Grade Candle Wax with up to 110 Hour Burn Time
author: kathleen
review: I have come to the conclusion that the lemon candles do not smell nicely. I burn them for hours and I cannot even tell they are on

author: Diana Torres
review: Summer Storm is one of our favorite candle scents.  Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Summer Storm Large Jar Candle, Fresh Scent
author: Diana Torres
review: Summer Storm is one of our favorite candle scents.  Highly recommend.

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Amazon Customer
review: Bought one candle and it was defective. Did a refund and ordered it again (had to pay more). Then I received another damaged candle. This is a gift, so I'm trying again for a replacement, but I have a feeling that I will receive yet again another damaged candle. The reviews online show a lot of these candles like this. Very poor quality control!

product_title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Sage & Citrus
author: Quentin J.
review: Scent was trash
